programme.title: Winged Creatures
programme.desc: Tavallinen paiva tavallisessa ravintolassa Los Angelesissa. Rauha rikkoutuu silmanrapayksessa, kun psykopaatti astelee sisaan ravintolaan, ottaa aseen esiin ja alkaa ampua eparoimatta ympariinsa. Osa ihmisista kuolee. Henkiinjaaneet yrittavat ymmartaa mita on tapahtunut, ja miten elamalle saa taas uuden merkityksen ja turvallisuuden tunteen.

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: Maria on pikkuvanha tytto, joka ei muuta halua kuin tulla arkeologiksi kuten isansa Marcelino. He tutkivat yhdessa paikallista Altamiran luolaa ja loytavat muinaisia luolamaalauksia, jotka kuvaavat harkia ja ihmiselaman eri muotoja.

programme.title: Fast Girls
programme.desc: Kun teravakielinen katujen kasvatti Shania (Lenora Crichlow) kohtaa kunnianhimoisen, keskiluokkaisen Lisan (Lily James), heidan erilaiset maailmansa tormaavat pikajuoksuradalla lahes tuhoisin seurauksin. Elokuvan “FAST GIRLS” paahenkiloiden haaveena on edustaa maataan yleisurheilun MM-kisoissa. Matka sinne on dramaattinen, raastava ja inspiroiva.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Beatrix Potter
programme.desc: Han on ihastuttanut monia sukupolvia, mutta hanen elamansa on ollut salaisuus. Tahan saakka. Beatrix Potter on 30-vuotias sinkkunainen aikana, jolloin naisen kunnioitettavin tehtava on menna hyviin naimisiin. Kukaan, ei edes Beatrixin oma perhe, ymmarra sita, etta Beatrix haluaa mieluummin piirtaa ja kertoa tarinoita elaimista. Kaikki menee pieleen, kun Beatrix tapaa kokemattoman kustantajan Norman Waynen, joka rakastuu korviaan myoten niin Beatrixin ainutlaatuisiin tarinoihin kuin itse Beatrixiinkin. Beatrix joutuu mahdottomaan tilanteeseen, jossa hanen pitaa irrottautua perheen tukahduttavasta otteesta.

programme.title: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Hortense Cumberbatch on keskiluokkainen lontoolainen ja menestyksekas optikko. Adoptioaitinsa kuoleman jalkeen han paattaa etsia biologisia juuriaan. Tummaihoinen Hortense yllattyy suuresti saadessaan selville, etta hanen biologinen aitinsa on valkoinen yhteiskunnan laitamille ajautunut tyolaisnainen. Uuden perheensa kanssa vietetty aika muuttaa Hortensea pysyvasti. Salaisuuksia ja valheita kahmi huikeat viisi Oscar-ehdokkuutta, ja se on yksi Mike Leighn menestyksekkaimpia elokuvia. Se palkittiin Cannesin Kultaisella palmulla, Golden Globella ja kolmella Baftalla.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: Dont Come Knocking
programme.desc: Hollywood-tahti Howard Spence (Sam Shepard) on nahnyt parempiakin paivia, mutta nyt han ratsastaa vain menneella maineellaan. Jalleen yhden irstailuillan jalkeen han pakenee uuden lankkarin kuvauksista ja ratsastaa preerialle kuin yksi sankareista, joita han on niin usein naytellyt. Han etsii suojaa aitinsa (Eva Marie Saint) luota, jota han ei ole nahnyt vuosiin. Tosin siellakaan han ei viivy kauan saatuaan tietaa, etta hanella saattaa olla poika, josta han ei ole tiennyt. Howardille tama tuo toivoa siita, ettei hanen elamansa ole ollutkaan taysin turhaa. Ehka jossain on paikka, jonne han kuuluu.

programme.title: The Dark Divide - Elamaan eksynyt
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva Sukuvika -sarjasta tutun David Crossin ja Will and Grace -sarjasta tunnetun Debra Messingin tahdittama draamakomedia. Robert on perhostutkija, jonka vaimo sairastuu syopaan. Vaimo patistaa maansa myyneen miehen perhosretkelle, jonka odottamattomat kohtaamiset ja odotetut vastoinkaymiset avaavat Robertin silmat jalleen.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America - Suuri gangsterisota
programme.desc: Tarina kahdesta New Yorkista kotoisin olevasta lapsuudenystavasta, joista tulee varakkaita ja vaikutusvaltaisia gangstereita 1920-luvun aikana. Kumpikaan ei kykene tyydyttamaan syvimpia haaveitaan tai himojaan, ja heidan tiensa erkanevat rajahtavan vakivaltaisesti tavalla, josta selviaa totuus vasta 35 vuotta myohemmin.

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Jimmy P.
programme.desc: Huolestunut Amerikan alkuperaisasukas muodostaa poikkeuksellisen ystavyyden ranskalaisen psykoanalyytikon kanssa, kun he yrittavat loytaa parannuskeinon karsimykselleen.

programme.title: In Tranzit
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan paatyttya joukko saksalaisia sotavankeja lahetetaan leningradilaiselle vankileirille. Leirin naistyontekijat vihaavat heidan miehensa ja poikansa tappaneita saksalaisia yli kaiken ja valmistautuvat nyt kostoon.

programme.title: Paamies
programme.desc: Eras poika nakee mafia-asianajajan murhan ja saa tietaa salaisuuden, jota suojatakseen roistot ovat valmiit tappamaan.

programme.title: Fast Girls
programme.desc: Kun teravakielinen katujen kasvatti Shania (Lenora Crichlow) kohtaa kunnianhimoisen, keskiluokkaisen Lisan (Lily James), heidan erilaiset maailmansa tormaavat pikajuoksuradalla lahes tuhoisin seurauksin. Elokuvan “FAST GIRLS” paahenkiloiden haaveena on edustaa maataan yleisurheilun MM-kisoissa. Matka sinne on dramaattinen, raastava ja inspiroiva.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Arkkitehti Leo Watersin avioliitto saroilee. Hanen vaimonsa Julia ei ole onnellinen, ja heidan poikansa Martin jattaa opiskelut kesken ja palaa kotiinsa eksyneena, eika oikein onnistu loytamaan yhteista savelta Leon kanssa. Christinatyttarella on murrosika kaynnissa kaikkine vartalossa ja tunteissa tapahtuvine muutoksineen. Kuvaan astuu Tonya Neely, poliittinen aktivisti joka asuu Leon monta vuotta sitten suunnittelemassa kerrostalossa.

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: On Aika Tappaa
programme.desc: Elokuvan ohjaaja on Joel Schumacher (Batman Forever, Paamies). Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Matchew McConaughey ja Kevin Spacey esittavat paaosia murhaoikeudenkaynnissa, joka nostaa pienen mississippilaiskaupungin rotujannitteet valokeilaan. Aktivistimarssien, Ku Kluz Klanin hirmuvallan, mediarummutuksen ja vakivaltaisten mellakoiden keskella kokematon, mutta idealistinen nuori asianajaja jarjestaa aj atuksia herattavan oikeussalitaistelun oikeuden puolesta. Loisteliaasseen nayttelijakaartiin kuuluvat myos Breda Fricker, Oliver Platt, CharlesS. Dutton, Ashley Judd, Patrick McGoohan, Chris Cooper ja seka Donald etta Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Once Were Warriors
programme.desc: Heken perheessa ei ole rauhallista hetkea. Jake Heke on vakivaltainen humalassa, toinen poika on liittynyt katujengiin ja toinen odottaa syytteita. Beth-aidilla ja lapsilla on edessaan vaikea mutta elintarkea paatos: jaada toivottomaan tilanteeseen tai rikkoa kahleensa. Kerran sotureita on palkittu perhedraama menneisyyden hyvaksymisesta ja tulevaisuuden luomisesta.

programme.title: Journeyman
programme.desc: Puolustettuaan titteliaan rankassa ottelussa, nyrkkeilyn keskisarjan maailmanmestari Matty Burton romahtaa. Matka kohti puhe-, liikunta- ja muistikyvyn palautumista tulee olemaan rankin hanen otteluistaan, mutta palkinto on tyon arvoista, kun hanen suhteensa vaimo Emmaan ja tytar Miaan on pelissa.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.desc: Newly-weds seek period property in Cumbria for £700,000.

programme.title: Shropshire
programme.sub-title: S13 : E20 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules aids couple seeking South Shropshire retirement home with £400K.

programme.title: Norwich to Cumbria
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Catherine Gee is up against the clock to find a country home in Cumbria for a family of three. Lynn, Simon, and their son are mad about country living. Lynn has already accepted a new job in Cumbria, but the family have no home to go to.

programme.title: Streatham to Cambridgeshire
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Professor Dimitri may be a native New Yorker but now he wants somewhere a little quieter to share with his partner, her sister, and their cat. The family has three hundred and fifty thousand pounds for a retreat in the Cambridgeshire countryside.

programme.title: Nottingham to South Yorkshire
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Tracey is a passionate organic gardener – she wants to swap her suburban backyard for a house with plenty of land in the South Yorkshire countryside. There also must be room for her partner Paul and his beloved sports car.

programme.title: Berkhamsted to Suffolk
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Pam and Richard like to agree to disagree so it’s amazing they’ve decided to move to the countryside. Richard needs to be closer to his boat and Pam wants to be close to him, so the challenge is on to find a coastal property in Suffolk.

programme.title: Solihull to Warwickshire
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Flight attendant Louise and her pilot boyfriend Chris crisscross the globe staying in all the top cities. Now they’re buying their first home together and know exactly what they’re looking for – a peaceful country sanctuary.

programme.title: Brixton to Wiltshire
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Tessa and David have rapidly grown into a family with the arrival of twins. Now they want to leave their frenetic life in Brixton. They have £400k for a rural retreat in Wiltshire to raise their children and help David fulfil his writing ambitions.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: The suburbs of Glasgow have been home to Malcolm for 30 years. Now he wants to escape to Sir Walter Scott country–the Scottish Borders. Melissa Porter turns up a few surprises in her search for a traditional cottage for Malcolm and his partner Cath.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E18 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Lawyer Mandi wants to give up her daily commute and open a cattery. She also needs enough land for two show horses–a husband and a son who love tractors! Catherine Gee goes shopping for the home that’s going to change the family’s life.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E20 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: The Nelms are establishing a new recipe for family life—Nigel has given up the corporate world. Now they want to trade their suburban life for a perfect country retreat. Catherine Gee has £550k to find a place that keeps everyone happy.

programme.title: St Albans to Norfolk
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Catherine Gee has a challenge on her hands; she’s on the hunt for a four-bedroom country home in Norfolk for less than two hundred thousand pounds.... Mom Nishi has already got an offer on her home in St Albans so she’s ready for a quick move.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Michael and Diana want a complete change of lifestyle with a move to Devon. Driving instructor Michael wants to turn his back on Dartford’s congestion. He and Diana have £375k to find a home that will attract friends and family for the weekend.

programme.title: Glasgow to the Borders
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: The suburbs of Glasgow have been home to Malcolm for 30 years. Now he wants to escape to Sir Walter Scott country–the Scottish Borders. Melissa Porter turns up a few surprises in her search for a traditional cottage for Malcolm and his partner Cath.

programme.title: Derby to Lincolnshire
programme.sub-title: S03 : E18 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Lawyer Mandi wants to give up her daily commute and open a cattery. She also needs enough land for two show horses–a husband and a son who love tractors! Catherine Gee goes shopping for the home that’s going to change the family’s life.

programme.title: Workingham to The Norfolk/Suffolk Border
programme.sub-title: S03 : E20 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: The Nelms are establishing a new recipe for family life—Nigel has given up the corporate world. Now they want to trade their suburban life for a perfect country retreat. Catherine Gee has £550k to find a place that keeps everyone happy.

programme.title: St Albans to Norfolk
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Catherine Gee has a challenge on her hands; she’s on the hunt for a four-bedroom country home in Norfolk for less than two hundred thousand pounds.... Mom Nishi has already got an offer on her home in St Albans so she’s ready for a quick move.

programme.title: Ruislip to Berkshire
programme.sub-title: S03 : E27 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Young Jack has signed for Chelsea’s under nines, now the whole family want to swap their Ruislip suburban home for the Berkshire countryside. Jack wants a big garden for his football practice, mom wants a heart of the home kitchen.

programme.title: South Devon
programme.sub-title: S13 : E14 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair aids couple seeking Devon seaside home with annexe for £500K.

programme.title: Peak District
programme.sub-title: S13 : E16 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Nicki aids Manchester couple seeking first Peak District home with £700K.

programme.title: Suffolk
programme.sub-title: S13 : E18 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise aids couple seeking Suffolk home with studio and study for £450K.

programme.title: Shropshire

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teenager went missing after an evening of horseback riding. Her body was found a month later, three miles from her home. The killer unknowingly left trace evidence behind - tiny but unmistakable clues which pointed to him and him alone.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1996 investigation into 48-year-old Martha Hansens murder is helped by a legal requirement that bars have video cameras installed on the premises.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman who suffered from mental illness is found dead. Was it due to natural causes, suicide or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The investigation into the kidnapping and rape of an 18-year-old Ohio woman is aided when the victim returns hours after the incident occurred. With her help, the police are able to track the assailant to his front door.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are dispatched to the scene of a shooting, and discover the victims husband is one of their own.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappeared along a California highway in 1991. Three years later, the case was solved when a mans refrigerated truck was looked upon with suspicion.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 19-year-old woman was found dead in her car, the scene had been staged to make murder appear to be suicide

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two men were murdered in their beds. The next night, arson destroyed a family planning clinic. Investigators find a link between the two separate crimes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman convicted of killing her mother in a car fire is granted a new trial. An expert witness has a different opinion as to how the fire started and, if proven, would clear the woman of any culpability.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an elderly couple died in a suspicious house fire, their son became the prime suspect. Investigators turned to forensic science to determine if the fire had been set deliberately, or if it was an unfortunate accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When hunters found a skull in a Texas canyon, police found bits of clothing, small bones and a strand of hair. A forensic artist reconstructed her face. Now all they had to do was find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Native American woman was brutally killed in the desert of New Mexico, and the crime scene was rich in forensic evidence: tire tracks, shoe impressions and even the murder weapons.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a talented television news anchor is shot to death outside her home, it appears to be a crime of passion perpetrated by an obsessed fan.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man riding a bicycle was fatally injured, and police believed he was the victim of a hit-and-run accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the murder of Seattle residents, evidence from the couples dog eventually ties a murderer to the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the mail-order bride of a former army sergeant goes missing, investigators look into the deaths of the mans previous two wives.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A car carrying three men pulls up alongside another on an Alaskan highway and fires shots, leaving a passenger dead. One of the passengers in the killers car agrees to testify against his friends. The resulting trials dont end the carnage.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1999, a 12-year-old was found murdered in her home in Minnesota. Despite a meticulous search of the home and an exhaustive investigation, police had no suspects.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the summer of 1986, Kathleen Lipscombs body was found on a deserted road outside of San Antonio.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After 6-year-old Michelle Lee Dorr went missing, her father confessed to murdering her. But investigators soon poked holes in his story, leaving the case unsolved for 14 years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The police investigate when a severed leg is discovered among garbage. Conventional means of identifying the victim are impossible, leading investigators to rely on DNA, forensic anthropology and toxicology.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, California firefighters battled ten arson fires in three weeks. When cigarettes and a scrap of paper connected the case to similar fires further north, the hunt was on for a dangerous pyromaniac.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man tells police he shot an intruder who killed his wife. Forensic evidence disproves that story later on.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in a ravine, but crucial crime scene evidence had been washed away by severe thunderstorms. Almost 20 years later, an old hat brought the killer to justice.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When more than 700 Oregonians contracted food poisoning from a unique strain of salmonella in 1984, investigators uncovered a secret plot to influence local elections.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Prompted by news of a flight attendants brutal murder, the son of a previous victim contacts police.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police recovered the car of a missing man, they expected to find his body - but it wasnt there.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Janet Overton died suspiciously in 1988, and the investigation hit a dead end when the autopsy indicated no foul play was involved. A telephone tip and the sensitive nose of a forensic examiner indicated otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two women from the same town were murdered in the same way, police feared a serial killer was on the loose. At first they thought the victims had nothing in common until they found tiny clues linking them to the same man.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police hoped the shoe impressions found at a crime scene would put their investigation back on track.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a victim is brutally murdered in his bed, investigators find a shoe impression in the mud outside.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A behavioral profile caused the Baton Rouge Police Department to search for the wrong man. They might not have made an arrest had it not been for a DNA picture of the suspect painted by a molecular biologist.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Exploring how an American hit single from 1966 -- "The Cheater" by Bob Kuban and the In-Men -- foreshadowed the demise of the groups lead singer, Walter Scott.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Glory 09: New York was a kickboxing event held on June 22, 2013 at the Hammerstein Ballroom in New York City, New York. This event featured a Glory 95kg Slam Tournament.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 07: Milan at the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy April 20, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Giorgio Petrosyan and Hafid El Boustati as headliner. In co-main event, Murthel Groenhart had to battle with fellow superstar Robin van Roosmalen, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY makes its debut in Turkey with GLORY 6: Istanbul. The main event features a super fight between Gokhan Saki against Daniel Ghiță. The event features 14 more fights with the likes of Joseph Valtellini, Filip Verlinden, Nieky Holzken, and Fabiano Cyclone among others.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: From the PaloLottomatica in Rome, Italy on November 3, 2012. This event featured the Glory 70kg Slam Tournament final 8 Quarter Finals, Semifinals and Final. Albert Kraus withdrew from the tournament due to the flu and was replaced by Yoshihiro Sato.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 07: Milan at the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy April 20, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Giorgio Petrosyan and Hafid El Boustati as headliner. In co-main event, Murthel Groenhart had to battle with fellow superstar Robin van Roosmalen, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing

programme.title: Man Who Cried for Revenge
programme.desc: Davy Flanagan, a former Union officer who was part of an attempt to break out of a Confederate prison camp during the Civil War and suffered a blow to the head that left him with amnesia. Then a bounty hunter shows up to collect a bounty on his head as a deserter.

programme.title: Four Rode Out
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal sets out to bring in a Mexican bandit accused of killing his girlfriends father, but it turns out that theres more to the story than there first appears to be.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother is pitted against brother in this tale of feuding ranchers in the Old West.

programme.title: For a Book of Dollars
programme.desc: A bounty hunter named Amen is hired by a group of nuns to recover stolen money. However, the nuns turn out to be female desperadoes in disguise, plotting to retrieve the booty pillaged by the ruthless outlaw Catapult and his gang. Amen must navigate a world of deception, danger, and betrayal to complete the job.

programme.title: Guns Of The Revolution
programme.desc: In Mexico, a mad general is leading his own war against the Church.

programme.title: Buckskin Frontier
programme.desc: A railroad man and the owner of a freight line battle for control of a crucial mountain pass.

programme.title: Murieta!
programme.desc: The story of Joaquin Murrieta, a real life Mexican bandit who terrorized California with his gang of raiders and cutthroats during the first half of the 19th century. Some saw him as a murderous outlaw, others as the Mexican Robin Hood.

programme.title: Bury Me Not
programme.desc: Two women hide the surprising truth as a sheriff investigates a murder.

programme.title: Companeros!
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E09-12
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

programme.title: Twice a Judas
programme.desc: After waking up with amnesia in the desert next to a dead man, Luke Barrett begins piecing together his past. A stranger in black reveals that Luke was hired to kill his own brother, Victor Barrett, a wealthy landowner. As Luke seeks the truth, a deadly confrontation looms, and his memory recovery brings both clarity and danger.

programme.title: The Ugly Ones
programme.desc: An escapee Mexican outlaw returns to his hometown, where he is sheltered from a tenacious bounty killer by the townspeople - who discover too late that he is a changed man.

programme.title: Incredible Rocky Mountain Race
programme.desc: An old man observes a boy bullying his playmates and treats him to a morality lesson. The man tells the story of the epic cross-country race between a young Mark Twain and his rival, Mike Fink.

programme.title: Bad Mans River
programme.desc: Robber Roy King loses his wife, Alicia, to revolutionary Montero. Despite their rivalry they collaborate in an attempt to rob the Mexican government of one million dollars.

programme.title: Rattler Kid
programme.desc: Falsely convicted for robbing an army treasury, Tony Garrett escapes prison and sets out to find the real criminals responsible. As he hunts for revenge, he faces dangers and uncovers dark truths, determined to clear his name and make the true culprits pay for their actions.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E13-16
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Kill Django... Kill First
programme.desc: In a mining town, Johnny MaGee clashes with banker Anthony Burton, who uses bandits and deceit to seize gold mines and control the economy. Partnering with an old miner, Johnny seeks justice, while navigating love, betrayal, and alliances. As tensions rise, a bounty hunter joins the fray, promising a final showdown against corruption.

programme.title: White Fang
programme.desc: The wolf dog, White Fang, aids a reporter, a fur trapper, a nun, a young Eskimo boy and his father of ridding a gold mining town of a sleazy crime lord in 1896 Yukon, Canada.

programme.title: Tepepa
programme.desc: In early 20th century Mexico, Tepepa, a revolutionary hero, is set to be executed by Cascorro’s men. Just as the firing squad prepares, Doctor Henry Price, an Englishman, arrives and saves Tepepa. However, Price’s true intentions are revealed when he coldly explains that he saved him only to have the pleasure of killing him himself.

programme.title: Five Guns West
programme.desc: Shalee Jethro (Dorothy Malone) helps her father run a desert stagecoach station.

programme.title: Cut-Throats Nine
programme.desc: A cavalry troop is escorting a wagonload of convicts on their way to prison through the mountains when they are attacked by a bandit gang. Only a sergeant, his beautiful young daughter, and an assortment of seven sadistic, murderous prisoners survive, and they are left without horses or a wagon. The sergeant must find a way to get his prisoners to their destination while protecting his daughter, watching out for the still-pursuing bandits, and trying to determine which prisoner is the man who raped and murdered his wife.

programme.title: Django the Bastard
programme.desc: A ghostlike stranger arrives to avenge a Civil War betrayal. Former Confederate officers who caused the massacre of their own unit begin to die one by one, as Django delivers chilling justice from beyond the grave.

programme.title: Boot Hill
programme.desc: Victims of oppressive town boss Honey are offered help by an unusual alliance of gunmen and circus performers.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid embarks on a dual mission: rescuing a girl from a marriage to a false suitor and tracking down outlaws who robbed a gold-carrying stage. His task becomes clearer when he discovers that the so-called wealthy suitor is secretly behind the robbery. Cisco must untangle love, deception, and crime to bring justice.

programme.title: The Gay Amigo
programme.desc: Mistaken for bandits, Cisco and Pancho are captured by the Captain, who releases them to track the real gang. Cisco discovers the true leaders are the editor and blacksmith. Using cunning, he sows distrust between them, gains the blacksmith’s trust, and joins the gang, setting up a trap to bring the criminals to justice.

programme.title: His Name Was Sam Walbash, But They Call Him Amen
programme.desc: A cruel and ruthless bandit kills a tavern owner who had ratted him out to the authorities.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado is a gun-slinging professional gambler who struts into the small town of Silver Mine and wins half of the local saloon, the other part of which belongs to Barbara, whilst battling notorious outlaw Tucan.

programme.title: The Lonesome Trail
programme.desc: Johnny Rush, an Indian wars veteran, returns home to find his land seized by a cattle baron and his love engaged to the enemy. After a brutal fight leaves him unable to use his gun arm, Rush learns to wield a bow and arrow with deadly precision. Determined to reclaim his home and confront betrayal, he fights back against overwhelming odds.

programme.title: Dead are Countless
programme.desc: As a child, Johnny witnessed his father’s death at the hands of soldiers. Now an outlaw, he seeks revenge by killing soldiers whenever possible. Lieutenant Garringo is tasked with capturing Johnny and bringing him back alive. A dangerous game of cat and mouse ensues, with Garringo determined to fulfill his mission.

programme.title: Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: Bespectacled bounty hunter Stan Ross arrives in Canyon City after a bank robbery and uncovers a web of corruption. Hired by banker Jefferson to hunt Mexican bandits, Stan learns the bandits were falsely accused and once worked with Jefferson. As Stan digs deeper, he faces betrayal, hidden alliances, and a dangerous grip on the city.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E21-24
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: LIVEFEED
programme.desc: A live experience featuring the busy kitchen staff of El Camino, a popular Mexican restaurant

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Japanese food inspired by other cultures
programme.desc: Chef and culinary instructor Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us Japanese cuisine inspired by other cultures with a pork and tofu dish, sesame chicken salad, breaded pork cutlet, and even a French crepe.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Take a trip around the world in this episode of Up the Dish! Host Missy Hui hits the Great Wall running - her Chinese Fried Rice recipe is a classic complete with crispy bacon, crunchy onions and savoury scallions. Then, Poppy Sandler sets off for the Land of the Rising Sun with Crispy Sushi Rice and Spicy Tuna; sriracha mayo seasons the sushi-grade tuna and sticky short-grain rice cakes are fried (fried rice anyone?) to a beautiful golden-brown. Micah Trainors Gorgonzola-Chive Arancini puts a Sicilian spin on frying rice - panko-crusted arborio is creamy and flavourful with blue cheese and chives for this ultra-indulgent Italian redux. Rice Papad with Turkey Tikka Masala is Tiera...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Noodles are the star ingredients when chef Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen cooks up somen noodles with dipping sauce, ramen salad, a fried noodle dish, and a one-pot delight.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Get ready for a not-so-raw deal in this episode of Up the Dish! Host Poppy Sandler sets things in motion and slices up a simple, elegant Sashimi with tangy Ponzu and tart Wasabi Mayo on the side. Missy Hui gets carnivorous with Lamb Carpaccio and Dukkah - delicate raw lamb and a Middle Eastern-style dip served with some delicious pita! But wait, whats a vegetarian to do with all this meat? Tiera Singhs got the answer - island-style Poke Bowls, with fruit instead of fish. Refreshing watermelon is marinated in a savoury, soy-based sauce and served with rice. For the finale, Micah Trainor Up(s) the Dish with her Scallop Tartare and Beet Chips, combining raw scallops with ultra-decadent...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen showcases how easy it is to incorporate Japanese flavours into everyday meals.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Chicken, Tempura, Frittata, and Ragu
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, Indian-inspired Goan chicken! Next, classic tempura! Followed by Tunisian-style frittata! Finishing with veal ragu!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides and Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Sweden, Mexico, Senegal, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Sweden - Swedish Turnips and Granola, Mexico - Radicchio Tacos, Senegal - Cashew-Sweeth Potato Maafe, and Italy - Bok Choy Fusili!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 South Africa, Iceland, Bangladesh, Spain
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by South Africa - Braaied Rapini, Iceland - Cold Icelandic Pepper Soup, Bangladesh - Edamame Jhalmuri, and Spain - Spanish Broccoli Tortilla!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 India, Belgium, Italy, China
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by India - Bhindi Masala-Style Nopales, Belgium - Belgian Plantain Waffles, Italy - Almond Crusted Portobellos, and China - Sichuan Artichoke Stir Fry!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 USA, Vietnam, Spain, India
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by the USA - Scalloped Cassava Casserole, Vietnam - Pear Summer Rolls, Spain - Hempseed Romesco with Leeks, and India - Potato Biryani Hash!

programme.title: Flour Power

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E17 Hot and Cold Recipes
programme.desc: Warm summer weather in Lebanon calls for less time in a piping hot kitchen! Fun host Jasmin Ibrahim prepares a refreshing salad with crunchy pita crisps called Fattoush and pairs it with a juicy chicken kebab. Then, she shows us a traditional Lebanese dish for a rainy day - Lentil Noodle Soup. With delicious brown lentils, warm and citrusy coriander, and tasty Lebanese pita noodles, this dish is sure to warm up your belly. Next, Jasmin cooks up a classic dish from the ancient Mediterranean coastal city of Tripoli. This traditional recipe, called Sayadiyeh, features a crispy fried cod and fluffy rice sprinkled in toasted almond slices. For dessert, Jasmin shows us one of her favourites,...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Winters in Greece can get chilly, so fun host Joanna Chery warms us up with some hearty Greek dishes. First, she rolls up some tender Meatballs in a Lemon-Egg Sauce featuring a secret ingredient: rice (shh!). Then, she cooks a vegetarian stew thats packed with tasty artichokes, soft-boiled potatoes, and fragrant dill - great for a cool spring night. To finish, she makes a famous Greek dish called Moussaka. Traditionally eaten at Sunday dinner, this dish emulates the warmth of friends and family. Although its a two part process - its packed with layered vegetables, a hearty meat sauce and a creamy bechamel on top - its so worth it!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E18 Nuts about Walnuts, Pine Nuts and Pistachios
programme.desc: Nuts are a staple in Lebanon - they add depth of flavour and make dishes more hearty. Talented home cook Jasmin Ibrahim shows us a unique Lebanese dish that is traditionally made in the dead of winter - Winter Tabbouleh. With no fresh herbs or vegetables, this crunchy nut, feta, and tasty bulgur salad will get you through a long winter night. Next, she makes a simmering beef tortellini with toasted pine nuts in a hot, tangy yoghurt sauce. She then cooks up tender Celebration Lamb showered in three kinds of tasty nuts; its great for sharing at special occasions. To finish off, Jasmin prepares some delicious walnut-filled Lebanese Pancakes doused in sweet rose water - yum! Ditch the...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E25 From the Island of Crete
programme.desc: Greek expert Joanna Chery showcases unique recipes from the island of Crete. To start, she whips up a creamy Cretan Meat Pie. Sweet ricotta, tender lamb, and an aromatic bundle of spices covered in a flaky Greek yoghurt pie dough might be the best Greek comfort food. Next, Joanna makes Grouper with Okra - a light and healthy dish featuring flaky sea bass, fresh okra, and delicious potatoes. Then, she prepares a dish thats traditionally served at weddings - Gamopilafo. Its a fluffy, citrusy, rice pilaf topped with crispy, juicy chicken that will have you going back for seconds! For dessert, a popular Cretan treat called Baklava. Joanna expertly layers crispy, golden-brown phyllo pastry...

programme.desc: A pastor must follow a councils decision to fire some staff at the school because theyre not Christian.

programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark investigate a gang of drug smugglers after an old friend of Marks has disappeared.

programme.desc: Jonathan steps in when a heart condition sidelines a promising basketball players dreams.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Can his experience with combustible "Real Housewives" reunions and Lady Gaga pee-perfume hijinks prepare Andy Cohen for the likes of Zombie Apocalypse and Mad Dog 357?

programme.title: Barbarian
programme.desc: Detroitiin tyohaastatteluun saapuva nuori nainen vuokraa asunnon kayttoonsa. Kun han saapuu keskella yota, han huomaa, etta talon on varannut joku muukin, outo mies, joka on jo paikalla. Han paattaa kuitenkin jaada, ja saa pian huomata, etta paikassa on jotain paljon pelottavampaakin kuin vain odottamaton vieras.

programme.title: Irma Vep
programme.desc: Rene Vidal, ylistettu ja rakastettu elokuvaohjaaja, on joutunut rappiolle floppielokuvien seurauksena. Uusi projekti on Les vampires -klassikon uudelleenfilmatisointi, jonka paarooliin han on valinnut hongkongilaistahti Maggie Cheungin, mutta kuvauksissa mikaan ei suju Vidalin eika Cheungin suunnitelmien mukaan. Irma Vep on palkitun ohjaaja Olivier Assayasin (Personal Shopper, Clouds of Sils Maria) lapimurtoelokuva, jossa Jean-Pierre Leaud (Les quatre cents coups, Le Havre) esittaa ohjaaja Rene Vidalia ja Maggie Cheung (In the Mood for Love, Hero) kuvitteellista versiota itsestaan.

programme.title: The Company Men
programme.desc: Bobby Walkerilla on unelmatyo, kuvankaunis perhe ja saihkyva uusi Porsche autotallissa. Irtisanomiset ajavat Bobbyn ja hanen ystavansa kadulle, jolloin heidan pitaa maaritella itsensa uudestaan ihmisina, aviomiehina ja isina. Ehka se, jota Bobby joskus kutsui "tyoelamaksi", muuttuu pian oikeaksi elamaksi?

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember
programme.desc: Paha poika Landon valitaan koulunaytelmaan lukutoukka Jamien vastanayttelijaksi. Heidan valilleen puhkeaa romanssi, mutta tragedia uhkaa repia heidat erilleen.

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: Irma Vep
programme.desc: Rene Vidal, ylistettu ja rakastettu elokuvaohjaaja, on joutunut rappiolle floppielokuvien seurauksena. Uusi projekti on Les vampires -klassikon uudelleenfilmatisointi, jonka paarooliin han on valinnut hongkongilaistahti Maggie Cheungin, mutta kuvauksissa mikaan ei suju Vidalin eika Cheungin suunnitelmien mukaan. Irma Vep on palkitun ohjaaja Olivier Assayasin (Personal Shopper, Clouds of Sils Maria) lapimurtoelokuva, jossa Jean-Pierre Leaud (Les quatre cents coups, Le Havre) esittaa ohjaaja Rene Vidalia ja Maggie Cheung (In the Mood for Love, Hero) kuvitteellista versiota itsestaan.

programme.title: What doesnt kill you
programme.desc: Ohjaaja Brian Goodmanin omakohtaisiin kokemuksiin perustuvassa elokuvassa Mark Ruffalo (Brian) ja Ethan Hawke (Paulie) nayttelevat ystavyksia, jotka kasvoivat yhdessa kuin veljekset Etela-Bostonin rosoisilla kaduilla. He elavat katujen lakien mukaan ja tekevat mita vain selviytyakseen saalimattomalla asuinalueellaan. Rotostely ja rikkomukset pahenevat yha vakavammiksi rikoksiksi, ja lopulta he paatyvat jarjestaytyneen rikollisuuden ja sen johtajan, Pat Kellyn (Brian Goodman itse), vaikutusvallan alle. Brian sekaantuu yha pahemmin huumeisiin ja keikkoihin, eika edes hanen rakkautensa vaimoaan (Amanda Peet) ja lapsiaan kohtaan tunnu voivan pelastaa hanta.

programme.title: Mark Of A Murderer
programme.desc: "Mark of a Murderer" on tositarina NYPD-etsiva Vincent Lamarasta, joka on brutaalin murhaajan kintereilla. Epaillyn tavoittaessaan etsivakonkari rukoilee kerrankin erehtyneensa: poliisin haaviin on jaanyt Joey Lamara, Vincentin oma poika!

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Syrjainen mokki jarven rannalla, ei yhteytta ulkomaailmaan. Nuori nainen yrittaa sailyttaa jarkensa joutuessaan keskelle pelottavaa painajaista, josta ei paase pois. Syrjainen mokki jarven rannalla, ei yhteytta ulkomaailmaan. Nuori nainen yrittaa sailyttaa jarkensa joutuessaan keskelle pelottavaa painajaista, josta ei paase pois. Sarah valmistelee isansa ja setansa kanssa perheen vanhan kesamokin myyntia. Oudot tunkeilijat ovat vandalisoineet taloa, mutta rikkoutuneet ikkunat ja halkeilevat seinat osoittautuvatkin vahitellen heidan pienimmaksi murheekseen, kun he huomaavat, etteivat olekaan yksin? seinien raoista huokuu jotain pelottavaa?

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

programme.title: Irma Vep
programme.desc: Rene Vidal, ylistettu ja rakastettu elokuvaohjaaja, on joutunut rappiolle floppielokuvien seurauksena. Uusi projekti on Les vampires -klassikon uudelleenfilmatisointi, jonka paarooliin han on valinnut hongkongilaistahti Maggie Cheungin, mutta kuvauksissa mikaan ei suju Vidalin eika Cheungin suunnitelmien mukaan. Irma Vep on palkitun ohjaaja Olivier Assayasin (Personal Shopper, Clouds of Sils Maria) lapimurtoelokuva, jossa Jean-Pierre Leaud (Les quatre cents coups, Le Havre) esittaa ohjaaja Rene Vidalia ja Maggie Cheung (In the Mood for Love, Hero) kuvitteellista versiota itsestaan.

programme.title: A Late Quartet
programme.desc: Kun maailmankuulun jousikvartetin rakastettu sellisti saa kuulla laakariltaan mullistavan diagnoosin, on koko ryhman tulevaisuus vaakalaudalla. Tukahdutetut tunteet, kilpailevat egot ja hallitsemattomat intohimot uhkaavat suistaa vuosien ystavyyden ja yhteistyon raiteiltaan. Valmistautuessaan 25. vuosipaivan juhlakonserttiinsa, joka saattaa hyvinkin jaada myos viimeiseksi, on toivo heidan maineensa sailymisesta kiinni yhteisista siteista ja musiikin voimasta. Beethovenin Jousikvartetto nro 14 cis-molli opus 131:n ymparille rakennettu A LATE QUARTET on koskettava kunnianosoitus kamarimusiikille ja New Yorkin kulttuurimaailmalle.

programme.title: Viides Valta
programme.desc: He perustivat vallanpitajia hatyyttavan nettisivun ja heista tuli maailman jahdatuimpia ihmisia. WikiLeaksin perustajat Julian Assange ja Daniel Domscheit-Berg saivat haltuunsa kaikkien aikojen suurimman maaran luottamuksellisia ja vuodettuja tietoja Yhdysvaltain puolustusministeriosta. Silloin kaynnistyi sisainen taistelu. Paljonko kannattaa maksaa vapaan maailman suurimmista salaisuuksista? Mita niiden paljastaminen maksaa?Daniel Domscheit-Bergin oma kirja WikiLeaksista on pohjana aidolle trillerille, joka kertoo aikamme keskustelluimmasta ja ristiriitaisimmasta organisaatiosta WikiLeaksista ja sen perustajasta Julian Assangesta.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Southside With You
programme.desc: Barack ja Michelle Obaman ensitreffeista inspiraationsa ammentanut Southside With You kertoo tapahtumarikkaasta kesaisesta paivasta vuonna 1989, kun nuori ja hurmaava lakifirman kesaharjoittelija Barack Obama (Parker Sawyers) yrittaa hurmata vastahakoista asianajajaa Michelle Robinsonia (Tika Sumpter) koko paivan kestavilla treffeilla. Paiva johdattaa heidat taidenayttelysta Spike Leen Do the Right Thing -elokuvan naytokseen ja lopulta ihanaan suukkoon Baskin-Robbinsin jaatelokaupan edessa.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: Beatrice ja Victor asuvat samassa kerrostalossa New Yorkissa. He pitavat toisiaan silmalla ikkunasta, kunnes eraana paivana Beatrice nakee naapurinsa tekevan murhan. Beatrice tarttuu tilaisuuteen ja ryhtyy hyytavaan kostoretkeen Victorin avustuksella. Myos Victor janoaa kostoa, ja tapaaminen Beatricen kanssa kaynnistaa tuhoavan ja suunnattoman sodan paikallismafiaa ja molempien yhteista vihollista vastaan.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Syrjainen mokki jarven rannalla, ei yhteytta ulkomaailmaan. Nuori nainen yrittaa sailyttaa jarkensa joutuessaan keskelle pelottavaa painajaista, josta ei paase pois. Syrjainen mokki jarven rannalla, ei yhteytta ulkomaailmaan. Nuori nainen yrittaa sailyttaa jarkensa joutuessaan keskelle pelottavaa painajaista, josta ei paase pois. Sarah valmistelee isansa ja setansa kanssa perheen vanhan kesamokin myyntia. Oudot tunkeilijat ovat vandalisoineet taloa, mutta rikkoutuneet ikkunat ja halkeilevat seinat osoittautuvatkin vahitellen heidan pienimmaksi murheekseen, kun he huomaavat, etteivat olekaan yksin? seinien raoista huokuu jotain pelottavaa?

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: Sheriffi ja merijalkavaen veteraani Alden Rockwell yrittaa sopeutua vasten tahtoaan koittaneisiin elakepaiviin, kunnes hanen vanhaa armeijakaveriaan, naapuripiirin sheriffia ammutaan. Aldenia painostetaan tutkimaan tapausta. Kun todisteet viittaavat korruptioon, Aldenin taytyy ottaa tutkinta omiin kasiinsa tai katsoa vieresta, kun isompi paha valtaa kaupungin.

programme.title: Man About Town
programme.desc: Jack Giamoro elaa amerikkalaista unelmaa. Han on Hollywoodin halutuin kykyjenetsija. Nopeita autoja, paljon rahaa ja kaunis vaimo - you name it, Jacks got it. Mutta kun han eraana paivana kadottaa paivakirjansa - joka on taynna luottamuksellisia Hollywood-salaisuuksia - ja huomaa vaimonsa syrjahypyn, Jackin elama muuttuu loistokkaasta taysin tyhjanpaivaiseksi. Ja niin alkaa kultakalan epatoivoinen kamppailu haita vilisevassa meressa.

programme.title: I Survived . . .
programme.desc: A college freshman is sexually assaulted at gunpoint.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Crusty mechanic Chuck leads the scramble to ready the Electra for a disaster relief mission in Haiti, but fates curveball sends them to the High Arctic instead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikeys much-planned D-Day tribute parachute jump with 20 paratroopers hits a wall when Joe refuses to fly his DC-3 to the drop zone.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.
