programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 2"
programme.desc: After Justin Harris severely breaks his leg deep in a remote, Utah canyon, it ‘s up to his brother Jeremy to climb out for help. Clawing his way through icy pools of water and up rock faces, pushes Jeremy to his limit.

programme.title: Day 6
programme.desc: After exploring Peru, Jalou has to get over her fear when she goes white water kayaking. In Thailand, Kevin is feeling the pressure.

programme.title: Day 7
programme.desc: After a week, Kevin and Jalou find themselves in the same country again: Canada. They travel from Vancouver to Whistler for the final challenge.

programme.title: The Pagoda
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Geared Up S1 - "The Pagoda"
programme.desc: The team does a restoration modification of a 1964 Mercedes Benz 230 SL, adding custom made wheels and a modern engine.

programme.title: The Blazer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Geared Up S1 - "The Blazer"
programme.desc: A 1970 K5 Chevrolet Blazer undergoes a transformation with new paint, interior, and a diesel engine conversion.

programme.title: Episode Eight
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Eight"
programme.desc: Mike and Nik review the 2021 Ford Mustang Mach-E. Nik predicts the Genesis G80 will challenge German manufacturers. He showcases the 2021 Mini GP and Polestar 2. Mike explores the 2021 Infiniti QX50.

programme.title: Episode Nine
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Nine"
programme.desc: Nik experiences Mercedes-Benzs concept for Avatar 2. Both Nik and Mike unveil top-performing cars for value. Nik reviews the 2021 Kia Telluride and 2021 Lexus IS. Mike introduces the Ford Mach-E 1400.

programme.title: Gary, Indiana
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Epic Exploring S2 - "Gary, Indiana"
programme.desc: Josh is back in Gary, Indiana, for a local exploring adventure. With friends, he visits a former bank, the memorial auditorium and Union Train Station.

programme.title: Zagreb
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local visits Zagreb, Croatia. Cody fires a canon from the old tower, explores a never finished University Hospital and a political school.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in Las Vegas in a million dollar Lamborghini SVJ roadster. Taken under the wing of Patrick, founder of the Junkyard Pirates, Alex is brought into the rat rod world - home to American mavericks and outsiders.

programme.title: Miami
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Miami"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie is given the keys to a five million dollar Pagani Huayra L’Ultimo as she explores the sub-culture of lowriders with the seal of approval from Horacio Pagani himself. Will she be accepted into this tribe?

programme.title: Detroit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Detroit"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in ‘Motor City’ in the dead of winter but given access to a half million dollar new Ford GT raises her spirits. Her goal is to learn more about muscle cars, born in Detroit, and her journey takes her in different directions.

programme.title: Brazil
programme.desc: The World’s best Brazilian rider opens the doors to his house to show how it all started and brings us to Mexico for the most famous urban race in the world.

programme.title: Argentina
programme.desc: Two talented Canadian brothers and pro MTB riders decide to go on a freeride trip together and choose to explore the remote desert of Argentina.

programme.title: South Africa
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 MTB Heroes S3 - "South Africa"
programme.desc: We follow the fastest and most stylish female MTB pro rider in the world during a trip to South Africa where she will ride the best trails around Cape Town.

programme.title: Morgan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Morgan"
programme.desc: Mat’s demanding client Gordon is in search of a Morgan, but will he be able to find the ideal car for the right price?

programme.title: Citroen DS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Citroen DS"
programme.desc: Mat goes in search of a perfect Citroen DS for Leon, a man who has strong connections to the DS, and to France.

programme.title: Mini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mini"
programme.desc: Mat Watson travels Europe on the trail of a very special 1960s Mini.

programme.title: Hawaii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 The Travel Bug S2 - "Hawaii"
programme.desc: Hawaii is arguably the world’s best-known island holiday destination. It’s an adventure lover’s playground with volcanoes, mountains, diving, surfing and loads of other fun activities.

programme.title: Taiwan, Part I
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 The Travel Bug S2 - "Taiwan, Part I"
programme.desc: As far as cities go, Taipei is one of the most intense, chaotic and diverse metropolitan centres on earth. We learn about Taiwan’s turbulent history, take a look at the country’s unique culture and indulge in the famous street food.

programme.title: Taiwan, Part II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 The Travel Bug S2 - "Taiwan, Part II"
programme.desc: From the noise and chaos of Taipei, to the cities in the south west of the country. Here is a more traditional way of life, and a chance to explore more of Taiwan’s history before heading into the heart of the nation to see the Alishan mountains.

programme.title: 72 Charger SE Resurrected
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 Graveyard Carz S6 - "72 Charger SE Resurrected"
programme.desc: Will and Alyssa struggle with the billboard graphic. Mark finishes a suspension and the car that started the show rolls again.

programme.title: Grin and Bear a ‘Cuda
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Grin and Bear a ‘Cuda"
programme.desc: In the season 7 debut, its all about the Cudas. The ghouls get cracking on the infamous 71 Phantom Cuda and Mark gets three new Barracudas delivered.

programme.title: Operation Firepower?
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Operation Firepower?"
programme.desc: Mark announces a top-secret project to the ghouls and Allysa surprises her dad, when she manages to get him his old car for Father’s Day

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Running the World S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave undertake a run where they attempt to escape from Lisbon castle without using any conventional exit routes.

programme.title: Delhi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Running the World S1 - "Delhi"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave head to Delhi India to complete a treacherous final run challenge.

programme.title: Mexico City
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Running the World S1 - "Mexico City"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave race through an 18th century monastery on the outskirts of Mexico City and whoever rings the bell in the tower first wins.

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: A young snowmobilers first ride into the backcountry spins out of control.

programme.title: Episode 8
programme.desc: Tim demands a lot of everyone around him, especially during a cave rescue - what he describes as "the worst kind of rescue possible".

programme.title: Andy Soucek - Bentley Continental
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Andy Soucek - Bentley Continental"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Andy Soucek competing in the Bentley Continental at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Ahmad Al Harthy - Aston Martin Vantage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Ahmad Al Harthy - Aston Martin Vantage"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Ahmad Al Harthy competing in the Aston Martin Vantage at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Albert Costa - Lexus RC F
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Albert Costa - Lexus RC F"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Alberto Costa competing in the Lexus RC F at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Road Warrior
programme.desc: Wardens set up a decoy to stop road hunting in Region 7. Its not long before they catch a shooter.

programme.title: Last Hurrah
programme.desc: A veteran warden works his last season. Wardens look back at the decorated career of one of the best.

programme.title: Surfs Up
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Surfs Up"
programme.desc: Big surf have a couple of surfers turning to Island Air for an adventure of a life time.

programme.title: Closing Time
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Closing Time"
programme.desc: An unexpected storm leaves Island Air struggling to pull their planes for a mandatory maintenance.

programme.title: Ice Climbers
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Ice Climbers"
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation battles winter weather to ferry ice climbers onto the Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Prayer Point
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point"
programme.desc: On day three at "Prayer Point", Casey faces another opportunity, inconveniently timed. While answering natures call, a bull respondes to cow calls from camp, appearing across the river.

programme.title: Night Stalkers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Night Stalkers"
programme.desc: Exhausted and famished, the brothers persist downstream, barely mustering energy to set camp. They find abundant signs of moose and favorable terrain for their habitat.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part One
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part One"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate a rare Mirror Carp in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part Two
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part Two"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to fish wild Tuna in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Surviving a Bear Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Bear Attack"
programme.desc: Nick and Laura create kick-ass tests to explore the immense power and startling speed of grizzly bears. They use Hollywood stunt tools to experience an attack. Then try to recreate a “miracle” arrow shot that saved a man from being killed by a bear.

programme.title: Surviving Treestand Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving Treestand Accidents"
programme.desc: In this exciting episode we’ll find out the reasons why tree stand accidents happen and how we can prevent them. Cool science mixed with dynamic experiments send our hosts, our stunt team and our special crash test dummies plummeting to the ground.

programme.title: Siberia and Mongolia
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Travel Quest S2 - "Siberia and Mongolia"
programme.desc: This episode literally takes you to some of the world’s remotest places. First, a visit to Siberia…one of the most foreboding places on earth and yet we learn many of the stories are just myths.

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: The Philippines is an incredible destination with countless World War II reminders and memorials, historic connections back to Magellan and a happy, friendly people.

programme.title: Mountain Monsters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Mountain Monsters"
programme.desc: Mario is on the search of the outer limits of the mountains to find himself a monster red deer. His arrow successfully finds a big red and he showcases some recipes he learnt from the southern regions of Italy.

programme.title: Stripped
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Stripped"
programme.desc: Meet Nigel McNally and the team from Kestrel Beer who has hopes of breaking the land speed record in a restored 1930’a Riley Kestrel 9.

programme.title: Under The Desert Sun
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Fight to Survive S3 - "Under The Desert Sun"
programme.desc: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

programme.title: Tree Stand Nightmare
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Fight to Survive S3 - "Tree Stand Nightmare"
programme.desc: When avid bow hunter, Dr. Joe Baumgardner sets out to do routine maintenance on his tree stands, a twenty two foot fall leaves him with a severely broken leg and miles from help in the deep Mississippi woods.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1"
programme.desc: While solo climbing Mt. Goddard, a remote peak in the California Sierra, Gregg Hein’s leg is crushed by a boulder and he’s sent careening down the mountain. Barely able to stop his fall, he’s now faced with a horrific compound fracture.

programme.title: High Waters
programme.desc: Stuck in the tent for days, Chris and Kaid finally get a break in the weather. They realize the rain has flooded the river dangerously. Nonetheless, the hunt for big game persists.

programme.title: Moose Fever
programme.desc: Chris and Kaid pursue a big bull moose, and Kaid finds himself with hide in his crosshairs. Casey and R.L. continue their search for big game. The high river waters refuse to quit raging.

programme.title: Weary Travelers
programme.desc: R.L. and Casey venture far from camp to access prime moose territory during the rut. Meanwhile, bad weather prompts Chris to scout a potential new extraction point.

programme.title: Silver Kings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Silver Kings"
programme.desc: The group of iconic anglers reunite for a week of fishing and camaraderie in Belize. Bill Klyn and Tom McGuane fish for snook, Lori-Ann Murphy and Zach Gilford go after bonefish and Michael Keaton and Tom Brokaw pursue permit and tarpon.

programme.title: Grey Ghosts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Grey Ghosts"
programme.desc: The team of anglers cast into the flats off the coast of Belize in pursuit of bonefish. Tom Brokaw and Bill Klyn casts from a boat, McGuane and Yvon Chouninard try their luck wading and Michael Keaton and Lori-Ann Murphy use both methods.

programme.title: The Backcast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "The Backcast"
programme.desc: The group of anglers continue their weekend of fishing out of El Pescador Lodge and the Belize River Lodge. ~Tom McGuane experiences a memorable fight with a giat tarpon and we join up with angling legend Stu Apte in Florida.

programme.title: Day Three Pt.2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Pt.2"
programme.desc: Day three continues at Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West, FL. Our three remaining 2-man teams are doing everything they can to find, catch and release the biggest sharks they can for points with only one goal in mind, bring home the trophy and the title.

programme.title: Day Three Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Begins"
programme.desc: Day three ends at Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West, Florida, on the Madfin Shark Series and there can bo only one Madfin Shark Champion.

programme.title: Southern Bluefin Tuna Epic
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Southern Bluefin Tuna Epic"
programme.desc: After hearing reports of massive schools of southern bluefin tuna out of Milford Sound, Tim, Jordy, Kieran, Sam and Dave saddle up and try their luck, but a gear malfunction right in the heat of the moment threatens to seriously burst their bubble.

programme.title: Bay of Islands Exploration
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Bay of Islands Exploration"
programme.desc: The fellas set off to tick a box for rookie spearo Ants, aiming to bag him his first ever kingfish, before shifting focus to landing a few more prized fish in some stunning Bay of Islands blue water, but as it doesnt all go according to plan!

programme.title: South Minerva Reef
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 South Seas Spearo S2 - "South Minerva Reef"
programme.desc: The team embark on their biggest mission to date, an expedition to the remote and revered Minerva Reefs, where they encounter the most incredible diving conditions theyve ever experienced, but also, a thriving population of voracious sharks!

programme.title: Barentsburg
programme.desc: Local Exploring on the edge of the world as Josh is on the artic Svalbard archipelago to explore in and around Barentsburg and the Arctic Ocean.

programme.title: Tirana
programme.desc: From Tirana, capital of old Soviet satellite Albania, Josh starts another local adventure filled with bunkers, a hidden hospital and diving in a pirate’s cave.

programme.title: Luderitz
programme.desc: Epic Exploring is going local again as Cody adventures in Luderitz, Namibia going off the beaten path, through the desert and on to the ghost town of Pamona.

programme.title: RED-ish
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "RED-ish"
programme.desc: Terry takes himself out of “retirement” to test some scenes from RED that will be extremely dangerous. One of which Larry will take great joy in because he gets to fire an RPG at Terry to see if he can shoot it out of the air, and Terry gets to play with a mini-gun again to see if he can cut a van in half!!

programme.title: MacSchappert
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "MacSchappert"
programme.desc: What can Terry do with just a paperclip? Probably nothing, but Larry and Terry will test several scenes from MacGyver, including making an exploding pen, shooting a spear out of a telescope, and they will enlist the help of Andre Ellingson’s Special Effects team to see if they can turn a car muffler into a bazooka!

programme.title: Terry Loves Superheroes
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S6 - "Terry Loves Superheroes"
programme.desc: Holy Hollywood Weapons! Terry and Larry put some of your favorite Superheros to the test. Tune in to the same Bat Outdoor Channel for the results.

programme.title: FISHING IS NOT FAIR
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bottom Feeders S1 - "FISHING IS NOT FAIR"
programme.desc: The desire and competition for catching fish is at an all time high but fishing is anything but fair.

programme.title: STORM IS BREWING
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Bottom Feeders S1 - "STORM IS BREWING"
programme.desc: A distant natural disaster creates uncertainty for all commercial fishing crews in the upper Midwest. Jedd finds a valuable species in his haul but isn’t sure a market exists. Tim races against shifting conditions in hopes of scoring a decent haul.

programme.title: OLD and NEW FACES
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Bottom Feeders S1 - "OLD and NEW FACES"
programme.desc: Rick Johnson returns to fishing alone after spending three weeks with Jedds crew. Two new faces join Bottom Feeders: commercial fisherman and fish market owner, Jeff and his friend Steve.

programme.title: New Zealand South Island
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 The Travel Bug S2 - "New Zealand South Island"
programme.desc: The journey starts in Christchurch, before hitting the road to explore the South Island.Four-wheel driving in terrain where Lord of the Rings was filmed, walking on a glacier and learning a little about the Maori culture. It’s all in a days’ work.

programme.title: South Australian Outback Adventure
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 The Travel Bug S2 - "South Australian Outback Adventure"
programme.desc: As far as frontiers go, the Australian Outback is one of the last places on earth where you can really get lost! We take you from what many consider the Galapagos of Australia – Kangaroo Island – and into the water to swim with sea lions and tuna.

programme.title: Canada, Part I
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 The Travel Bug S2 - "Canada, Part I"
programme.desc: We travel from Vancouver and into the heart of Canada. This part of the journey takes in Canada’s most famous wine region, the desert, gorgeous lakes, and the spectacular Canadian Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Western Florida Monster Bass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Western Florida Monster Bass"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in this forgotten lake in western Florida.

programme.title: Back-alley Bass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Back-alley Bass"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in the alleyways and cuts of these northern Florida waters.

programme.title: Monster Bass in Lost Waters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Monster Bass in Lost Waters"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in waters that havent been fished in decades.

programme.title: Gran Canaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Running the World S1 - "Gran Canaria"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a run through an abandoned water park on the island of Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Running the World S1 - "Jamaica"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a unique run in an unusal setting on the Island of Jamaica.

programme.title: Best of ep. 7 to 11
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 7 to 11"
programme.desc: In this episode the boys look back over their time spent in Portugal India Mexico Gran Canaria and Jamaica.

programme.title: White Death
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Trail S1 - "White Death"
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse Seven has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: Strakka Racing - Mercedes AMG GT3
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Strakka Racing - Mercedes AMG GT3"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Strakka Racing who are competing in a Mercedes AMG GT3 at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Garage 59 - McLaren 650S
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Garage 59 - McLaren 650S"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Garage 59 competing in a McLaren 650S at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Shelly
programme.desc: A neglected 1981 Porsche 911 SC is brought back to life and restored to its original factory specifications.

programme.title: Cabriolet
programme.desc: A ruined and rested family heirloom 1962 Mercedes Benz 220 SE Cabriolet gets a restoration modification with a new Mercedes engine and a new interior with heated seats.

programme.title: Episode Ten
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Ten"
programme.desc: Nik praises the 2021 Audi e-tron Sportback. Mike talks about the return of the coupe SUV with the Infiniti QX55. Nik tests the Lamborghini Huracan EVO and explores the 2021 hybrid Wrangler 4XE.

programme.title: The Elephant In The Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "The Elephant In The Room"
programme.desc: Lyndal and Amanda are at a local market buying some wooden tables for the lodge as well as a few wood statues. Lyndal takes a quiet time out and goes to visit the Victoria Falls. Amanda, Bruce and Mark head into town for a farewell dinner for Bruce.

programme.title: Gisborne
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Gisborne"
programme.desc: Piri dives for Kina in Gisborne, and faces his fear of stingrays. Plus, he goes on a voyage on waka Tairawhiti, then visits Te Poho o Rawiri Marae.

programme.title: Manawatu / Whanganui
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Manawatu / Whanganui"
programme.desc: Piri goes in search of the illusive Samba deer near Marton. Plus a journey up the Whanganui River sees him chasing wild pigs.

programme.title: Whangarei
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Whangarei"
programme.desc: Piri tries his hand at snapper fishing from a kayak, goes scallop diving and attempts to out run a National Waka Ama champion.

programme.title: Bay of Plenty / Rotorua
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Bay of Plenty / Rotorua"
programme.desc: Piri drifts around Lake Rotorua with Inia Maxwell trout fishing. And meets up with seven’s player, Joe Webber, to go long lining for snapper.

programme.title: Botswana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 A Simple Path S1 - "Botswana"
programme.desc: Gaborone, Botswana is the turf of The Knuckelheads and unlikely skate spots, True-D fashion, traditional feasts, garage beats, inspiring street art and a fashion shoot in an abandoned building.

programme.title: Swakopmund
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 A Simple Path S1 - "Swakopmund"
programme.desc: Amidst the vast desert, we discover handmade leather shoes, the yellow bus on the beach, Kalahari truffles, the power of gemstones, keepers of the desert elephants and a skate ramp in the middle of the dunes.

programme.title: Around the Cape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "Around the Cape"
programme.desc: Different currents meet in the seas around the cape, which lead to huge seas. The waters around Cape Agulhas have a reputation of being amongst the most dangerous in the world because of the swell – and its inhabitants.

programme.title: Mountains of Kwazulu Natal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "Mountains of Kwazulu Natal"
programme.desc: Andreas Kieling continues his journey east, exploring the coastline and rainforests on his way to see South Africa’s largest inhabitants. A head for heights and a strong stomach are needed for a bungee jump from the magnificent Bloukrans Bridge.

programme.title: Martin Bochatay and Arthur Maneint
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Capturing Winter S1 - "Martin Bochatay and Arthur Maneint"
programme.desc: Martin and Arthur are two of the world’s best FPV drone pilots. Now the duo team up with pro skier and Olympic medalist, Kevin Rolland, for a unique project ; mount a cinema camera on a racing drone and attempt to film some never-before-seen action.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Streets S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Las Vegas is home to a hot rod car club community which over the decades has been connected to the rise of rockabilly music. Through Luke Metz and his band, Shanda and The Howlers, we learn how this bond between fashion, music and cars was created.

programme.title: Introduction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Introduction"
programme.desc: The journey begins. Andi and Chelsey introduce Mozambique from the luxury of a helicopter. In this episode the girls introduce two key conservationists who will re-join them later for epic ocean safaris. Welcome to Mozambique.

programme.title: Culture
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Culture"
programme.desc: Having sailed and docked at Inhambane, the girls set their coordinates in the direction of Porcos Island where they will visit an isolated island tribe.

programme.title: Surfing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Surfing"
programme.desc: Tofu is a hotspot for surfers from around the world. Andi and Chelsey join up with pro surfer Davey van Zyl and learn to surf in one of Mozambique’s best breaks. In this episode the girls discover the importance of local surfing culture.

programme.title: North Carolina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Van Life S1 - "North Carolina"
programme.desc: Meet Lisa, a former lawyer who escaped the rat race and moved into a campervan after the early death of her mother. Lisa embarks on a cross-country road trip, peeking inside homes on wheels, and connecting with the incredible community of nomads.

programme.title: Mississippi, Alabama and Arkansas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 My Van Life S1 - "Mississippi, Alabama and Arkansas"
programme.desc: A hurricane in the south forces Lisa to change direction. We meet southern Van Lifers living under the radar in a state where the lifestyle is judged harshly. Tragically, Lisa’s story takes a heavy turn when she discovers that her father has died.

programme.title: Texas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 My Van Life S1 - "Texas"
programme.desc: A colourful graffiti artist in Austin shares her story of loss with Lisa and gives her a tarot reading. We travel to rural Texas to overnight with Jupiter: an outspoken, non-binary person of colour, living in their vintage RV while studying law.

programme.title: Nairobi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 A Simple Path S1 - "Nairobi"
programme.desc: Uhuru Park is the nucleus for skateboarders in Gaborone. We meet street Keedz turning their lives around, a local animator, the producer of Sighkick Mag and learn how to make homemade trucks and sign language at Pallet Cafe.

programme.title: Jakarta
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 A Simple Path S2 - "Jakarta"
programme.desc: Jakarta, urban meets jungle. The yellow brick road, shiny shoes at Survive Skate shop, 24/7 under the bridge. Road trip to Bandung, a mosque session, Nasi Padang Every Day, Bhang records, live with Sigit, motion graphics and self-expression.

programme.title: Bali
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 A Simple Path S2 - "Bali"
programme.desc: Bali, the paradise island of magic. Its about progression at Motion Skate Park, DIY at the Jungle spot, vegan indulgence at Kynd cafe, design for the Hand of God, hot bowl grinds at the Dog Bowl and Loco by Nature and Televisi Star worldwide.

programme.title: LA
programme.desc: In LA, we hike with wolfs, Ayurveda insights with Jay and a delicious meal from Karla. Marilia takes an adventurous leap from an airplane, showing the freedom in extreme sports.Tracy showcases the joy of pursuing passions with WCMX at the skate park.

programme.title: London
programme.desc: James heads across the pond to discover what life for a blind traveler is like in a world capital like London.

programme.title: United Kingdom
programme.desc: Escaping the hustle and bustle of the big city, James takes the train to visit the rest of England - proving the rest of England is more accessible than one might think.

programme.title: Conservation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Conservation"
programme.desc: In this episode Andi and Chelsey learn to dive, this becomes a vital skill for later in the show. This is the first time the girls are exposed to the threats of the ocean…

programme.title: Swimming with Whales
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Swimming with Whales"
programme.desc: The girls meet up with Dr Andrea Marshal and head out on an ocean safari. This is their most epic nautical adventure yet!

programme.title: Luxury Resorts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Luxury Resorts"
programme.desc: The girls visit some of Mozambique’s most exclusive resorts and they do it in style. Andi and Chelsey compete in an ocean challenge for the ultimate prize, one night’s stay in the five star Flamingo Bay.

programme.title: Pe’ahi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Pe’ahi"
programme.desc: Will Skudin and Keali’i Mamala deal with the trials and tribulations of life as traveling big wave surfers.

programme.title: Mavericks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Mavericks"
programme.desc: Big wave surfing’s elite break routines and converge to ride an unforgettable swell at Mavericks.

programme.title: The Eddie
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "The Eddie"
programme.desc: The world’s elite big wave surfers revel in the biggest most powerful Waimea Bay surf conditions to ever grace the Eddie Aikau Contest.

programme.title: Milan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 A Simple Path S2 - "Milan"
programme.desc: 120 Hours in Milan where dreams come true. Connect at Rufus Skate and textured expressions. The global community at Milano Centrale. Candy Coast, try and try again for creative escape. Flying at Lambrate Skate Park, photographic genius and unity.

programme.title: Switzerland
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 A Simple Path S2 - "Switzerland"
programme.desc: Lugano, home of Morel, Oops Bar and The Warriors. To Basel for cheesy potatoes, DIY with Oli and Claudia, Pipoz, Portland Bowl, the president, creative concrete and wood and the Rock n Rollers. Back to The Beast then love underground at Bern Moosweg

programme.title: Berlin
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 A Simple Path S2 - "Berlin"
programme.desc: Berlin beautiful grunge, skate spoons, freestyle analogue,Griefswalder DIY and Skatesencia. Sketistan HQ, positive impact for kids the world over, NBU home of Hera, a space for expression. Place magazine, potato pants album cover prints and Templehof

programme.title: London
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx steps outside of her comfort zone to draw inspiration for her music track from urban youths in London’s Grime scene.

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Amsterdam to influence her music track and discovers it’s a whole lot more experimental than she imagined.

programme.title: Paris
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Paris, the city of love, for inspiration and discovers its diversity and a creative trend called retrofuture.

programme.title: NYC, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Breaking Beyond S1 - "NYC, USA"
programme.desc: Four BC One World Final legends from our series, Ronnie, Neguin, Junior and Shigekix, are coming to NYC. These legends will meet some of the future legends taking part in this year’s world final and take them on a journey through hip hop history.

programme.title: Guido Perrini and Geraldine Fasnacht
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Capturing Winter S1 - "Guido Perrini and Geraldine Fasnacht"
programme.desc: Cinematographer Guido Perrini has created many of the most revered ski and snowboard films. We follow him and multi-talented athlete Geraldine Fasnacht on a snowboarding and base jumping adventure in some of the most stunning peaks in the Swiss Alps.

programme.title: Layla Kerley and Bruno Compagnet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Capturing Winter S1 - "Layla Kerley and Bruno Compagnet"
programme.desc: Layla Kerley is a self-taught adventure photographer and one of the few females in her field. Together with Bruno Compagnet, co-founder of freeski brand Blackcrows, they plan to traverse one of the last wildernesses in Europe: the Italian Dolomites.

programme.title: Tristan Shu Lebeschu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Capturing Winter S1 - "Tristan Shu Lebeschu"
programme.desc: Renowned winter photographer, Tristan Shu, attempts his dream project; a photograph that combines astrophotography with action sports. His aim is to capture ski and snowboard tricks at night, set against the Milky-way and the spectacular Mont-Blanc.

programme.title: My Daughters Plan
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent S3 - "My Daughters Plan"
programme.desc: Kevin is retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses.

programme.title: Feels Like Home
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent S3 - "Feels Like Home"
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles.

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Running the World S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave undertake a run where they attempt to escape from Lisbon castle without using any conventional exit routes.

programme.title: Delhi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Running the World S1 - "Delhi"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave head to Delhi India to complete a treacherous final run challenge.

programme.title: İstanbul, Antalya and the TurkAegean Coast in Turkiye
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travels with Darley S1 - "İstanbul, Antalya and the TurkAegean Coast in Turkiye"
programme.desc: Explore history, culture and cuisine in İstanbul, Antalya and along Turkiye’s Aegean Coast. See the top sights in İstanbul and enjoy a behind the scenes look at old and new architecture and archeological sites.

programme.title: Cappadocia, İstanbul and Anatolia in Turkiye
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travels with Darley S1 - "Cappadocia, İstanbul and Anatolia in Turkiye"
programme.desc: Discover İstanbul, Cappadocia and Anatolia in Turkiye with host Darley Newman and local experts. Visit underground cities and go hot air ballooning amid Cappadocia’s magical

programme.title: Athens to Greek Easter
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Greek Odyssey S1 - "Athens to Greek Easter"
programme.desc: Our journey begins in the Greek capital of Athens. It’s one of the oldest cities in the world. It’s the birthplace of democracy, philosophy, modern medicine, mathematics, free speech and the power for you and I to vote for our elected officials.

programme.title: Epidaurus/Moni/Spetses
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 My Greek Odyssey S1 - "Epidaurus/Moni/Spetses"
programme.desc: This episode I’m leaving the big smoke, and heading across the Aegean to Epidavros. Here I’m going to delve into the history and unique culture of the region. This place has to be not only part of your journey, but a highlight.

programme.title: Inner Violence Waiting to Happen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Inner Violence Waiting to Happen"
programme.desc: Ryan puts out prayer flags for the people who helped finance his trip, a stark contrast to the ungrateful Elle caught in blame. Warm day quickly turns cold and many are complaining about wet bedding and frigid conditions.

programme.title: Miami
programme.desc: James Lance gets to grips with his Colombian roots while trying to build a career as a Latin hip hop artist. After raising himself as a teenager, he refuses to give up and dreams of a better future.

programme.title: Fuding
programme.desc: From making and eating zongzi rice dumplings to trying local street food, the hosts take part in the festivities before exploring the world of white tea.

programme.title: Wuyi Mountains
programme.desc: Tianran and Hannah enjoy tea ceremony on a bamboo raft, feast on everything from smoked goose to lotus seed soup, and explore an ancient town that once sold tea to Russia.

programme.title: Hangzhou Part 1
programme.desc: From West Lake to delicate Dragon Well tea, our hosts experience must-do attractions, savouring the local cuisine and trying everything from winter melon shaped like pork belly, to food cooked according to Traditional Chinese Medicine principles.

programme.title: Finland
programme.desc: Finland is that one Nordic country that is never on the global cuisine radar. However, the reserved Finns have been quietly perfecting their craft of foraging culture and incorporating it into their unique cuisine. Jonathan Legg explores the entire expanse of the country to understand it’s cuisine, and the ethos of the country’s top chefs; from amazing locally sourced cuisine in Helsinki, to an expedition in Lapland to learn about foraging and the Finnish delicacy, reindeer!

programme.title: Ireland
programme.desc: It’s the birthplace of Halloween, but the ghosts and ghouls which have canvassed the world have not scared up much interest in Irish cuisine. Mounting a classic motorcycle Jonathan tours a land of mystic traditions, boisterous locals, and iconic scenery. The world’s most magnetic pub culture draws him in, border conflict pushes him out, and dark legends pull him around. It’s an adventure soaked in rain, lore, and the food of ancestor’s past.

programme.title: Russia
programme.desc: Jonathan faces his toughest challenge yet as he enters a country that has been coming to grips in defining and understanding their own cuisine. Through the historical turmoil and harsh climate, Russia has lost it’s traditional way of cooking, and eating. But the country is reviving this culture; Jonathan ventures the far stretches of the country to learn about modern cooks, as well as ancient kitchens housing the one key tool that gave birth to true Russian cuisine, the Russian oven. He’ll learn their insights, understand their efforts, and work with traditional Russian ingredients to learn what the cuisine used to be, and where it’s headed today.

programme.title: Eric Trochon – Solstice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Taste of France S1 - "Eric Trochon – Solstice"
programme.desc: Today we’ll visit the wonderful city of Paris and the restaurant of Eric Trochon - Solstice - an informal yet elegant restaurant awarded with a Michelin star.

programme.title: Pascal Barbot - Astrance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Taste of France S1 - "Pascal Barbot - Astrance"
programme.desc: In today’s program we will visit the star-chef Pascal Barbot, who became independent at age twenty-seven. Reservations at his 2 star Michelin-awarded restaurant Astrance are booked months ahead.

programme.title: Daniel Barratier – L’Auberge Sur-les-Bois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Taste of France S1 - "Daniel Barratier – L’Auberge Sur-les-Bois"
programme.desc: Daniel Barratier has worked with some of the best chefs traveling the world, now he’s back in his hometown, Annecy, the ”Venice of the French Alps" were he invested in a true fine dining restaurant.

programme.title: Matthieu Dupuis Baumal – Chateau de la Gaude
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Taste of France S1 - "Matthieu Dupuis Baumal – Chateau de la Gaude"
programme.desc: In this program we’ll explore the story of the skilled Chef Matthieu Dupuis Baumal, his style of cooking and how he took his team to greatness in only a couple of months! We’ll also visit one of the best olive oil producers in the world.

programme.title: Amandine Chaignot – Pouliche
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Taste of France S1 - "Amandine Chaignot – Pouliche"
programme.desc: In this program Amandine Chaignot demonstrates the extent of her talent, serving refined vegetarian-focused cuisine. We’ll get to know her secrets for stimulating flavors and the principles behind her raw, refined French cuisine.

programme.title: Antonin Bonnet – Quinsou
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Taste of France S1 - "Antonin Bonnet – Quinsou"
programme.desc: In this program we’ll get an insight of the importance of quality, as Antonin sources his ingredients with diligence. Making careful use of all elements, his kitchen manages to match sustainability with elegance and excellence.

programme.title: Hangzhou Part 2
programme.desc: Tianran and Hannah continue their tea-tasting journey along Hangzhous Qiantang River, exploring the regions historical culture and culinary delights.

programme.title: Shantou
programme.desc: Our hosts will savor the complex aroma of the curiosly named "Duck Poo Fragrance" tea, as well as enjoy a more traditional "yum cha" breakfast.

programme.title: Shaoguan
programme.desc: Tianran and Hannah try tea grown on Danxia landforms and feast on mountain produce, before getting hands-on with making rice noodles in a Hakka walled village.

programme.title: Turmeric
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Turmeric"
programme.desc: Journey alongside Lauren as she delves into the vibrant world of turmeric. From infusing it into dishes like Urap Pakis to crafting a healthful elixir called Jamu, discover the captivating flavors against the breathtaking backdrop of Mount Agung.

programme.title: Nut
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Nut"
programme.desc: Join Lauren on a culinary adventure with various nuts as she discovers their potential beyond snacking and incorporates them into Italian and Balinese recipes like Cashew cheese, mouthwatering Cabonara and more delightful flavors.

programme.title: Coconut
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Coconut"
programme.desc: Explore the boundless potential of coconuts with Lauren as she reinvents a calamari dish using coconut flesh, offering a taste experience that will leave you in awe and redefine your culinary perceptions.

programme.title: Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Maximum Foodie S1 - "India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?"
programme.desc: Liesel pinballs around a city known for its gastronomy, the forgotten hub of British East India trading company, Kolkata. From trying out what the bustling city’s vibrant street food scene has to offer, to the lesser known gems, including, venturing into India’s only Chinatown and sampling their delicacies. A tale of walking food tours, hole in the wall joints serving up North Eastern dumplings, messy fish markets, and of course, the pride of Bengal, the Hilsa fish. Is Kolkata up to par with the other major metropolitan cities of India? This episode finds out exactly that!

programme.title: Mauritius Part 1
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Mauritius Part 1"
programme.desc: East Africa beckons and Sashi is answering the call. Sashi is bouncing around the island nation to discover its culinary curiosities; from streetfood to haute cuisine, and everything else in between!

programme.title: Mauritius Part 2
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Mauritius Part 2"
programme.desc: East Africa beckons and Sashi is answering the call. Sashi is bouncing around the island nation to discover its culinary curiosities; from streetfood to haute cuisine, and everything else in between!

programme.title: Clement Bouvier – Ursus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Taste of France S1 - "Clement Bouvier – Ursus"
programme.desc: In his quest to amaze his guests, Clement aims to always surprise, always exceed their expectations. By bringing the very forest to the table, both in his cuisine and in architecture, his visitors are in for a special and unique treat.

programme.title: Mexico
programme.desc: Jonathan Legg is from California and he thinks he knows Mexican cuisine. This notion gets shattered as he experiences the onslaught of food in Mexico city! Between trying scorpion tacos and dodging shady markets in San Juan, he learns the dark art of sacred drinks, like pulque and mezcal, now turned into social libations. His journey also takes him to Oaxaca where he gets the low down on the fabled Mole sauce, and a long haul to a remote village reveals a secret ceremony that has origins of dark arts!

programme.title: Banana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Banana"
programme.desc: Indulge in the versatile world of bananas as Lauren skillfully crafts recipes, from banana flour sourdough bread to twist-infused pancakes, offering a tantalizing experience that showcases the endless possibilities of this humble fruit.

programme.title: Potato
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Potato"
programme.desc: Lauren explores the culinary possibilities of the humble potato. She demonstrates how to make perfect crispy potato wedges, a hearty potato and vegetable curry, and homemade gnocchi recipe that is hard to beat.

programme.title: Tofu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Tofu"
programme.desc: Discover the delicious and nutritious world of tofu with Lauren as she experiments with various textures and flavors, pushing the soybean to its limits to create amazing dishes like Scramble tofu and the sweet-spicy delight of Tahu Gejrot.

programme.title: Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Two street artists are fusing their styles together in one of the worlds finest cities, Lisbon.The challenge is left hanging by a thread when disaster strikes.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Street Art Challenge S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Two legendary street artists team up in London for the ultimate Street Art Challenge. Things get out of hand between the two as it turns into a street fight.
