programme.desc: In Reno, NV an intoxicated man is placed in isolation after exhibiting combative behavior. In Portland, OR a man wearing a red dress is brought in for trespassing and tells officers that he is in the FBI. In Reno, NV two young men are set straight after stealing a car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmates flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought into the detention center hogtied. A disruptive teen is sent to a holding cell. Casino valets tip the authorities about an intoxicated woman leaving behind the wheel.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A singer in custody performs for the officers. A woman is charged with burglary, and officers see right through a young womans tears.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies deal with chaos after volatile inmates begin fighting. Accusations of deceit plague a booking as a woman is arrested for drunk driving. Prisoners are restrained after causing a commotion.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Guards uncover grooming aids stashed in an unlikely spot while combing through a womans things. An incarcerated tourist threatens to bring in Johnny Cochran for his defense, and a drunk driver awakens to find X-rated artwork drawn on his body.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E19 A Night of Fights
programme.desc: A man tries to swallow his ring. A heroin addict wants help when he realizes his habit has cost him everything he loves. One man fights with his girlfriend in a bathroom, another fights with his girlfriend at home, both are surprised they are arrested for domestic violence. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughters boyfriend, and an inmates negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is charged with possession of an illegal substance. Police arrest a woman for narcotics, and a couple is caught passing a fake prescription.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for an open container of beer. In Salt Lake City, UT a woman is stunned as to how drug paraphernalia wound up on her person. In Las Vegas, NV a former bus driver relays sad details about his past. In Portland, OR a shoplifter receives some sage of wisdom from one of the officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A party of three girls are brought in after having been arrested for possession at a nearby music festival. Drugs are found on the person of a music festival attendee during intake. A slightly older party goer is taken into custody for possession.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesnt want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate is subdued for refusing to follow commands. A woman accused of running out on a dinner bill has her jewelry sawed off in jail. After issuing criminal terrorist threats, a man is jailed.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Melee in the Cell
programme.desc: A brawl breaks out between inmates during a routine jail breakfast. An inmate alters their uniform in provocative and outlandish ways. Concerns abound as one-man issues violent threats at deputies.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A Batman impressionist is arrested after punching Chewbacca. A broken arm doesn’t stop a woman from struggling with officers. A man finds out it’s better to pay the fine then do the time. A woman involved in an affair with an older gentleman claims she was set up.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A vice unit interrogates several individuals accused of sex crimes. Suicidal threats provoke a high-stakes situation within cell walls. Unable to raise bail, a woman is incarcerated for several days.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An aspiring martial-arts fighter tries to wriggle out of handcuffs and gets stuck. A football rivalry takes a bad turn when a Steelers fan assaults a Ravens fan.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After falling down a flight of stairs while drunk, a young man is amazed he is in jail for refusing to go to the hospital. A correction officer tries to explain to a young man why carrying a gun-shaped knife is not a good idea. An expectant father is arrested after a gin-fueled rampage at his parents house and misses the birth of his first child. A woman arrested for selling fake designer purses as real ones says she didn’t know it was a crime.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man thinks the doctors are CIA agents. A homeless karate practitioners actions land him in an isolated cell, and a Canadian man with no pants wants to arm wrestle.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tequila is to blame when a mans behavior gets him locked up. A woman tries to sell drugs online. A detainee in holding for a DUI is of the opinion that he’s been jailed for driving too slow.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR an intoxicated male suspect is brought in for DUI. In Salt Lake City, UT a happy drunk woman is pleasantly cooperative. An emotional detainee sheds some tears while in isolation. In Las Vegas, NV a man is strapped in a restraining chair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Off the Rails
programme.desc: Kolme viisikymppista naista haluaa toistaa nuoruutensa Interrail-seikkailut Euroopassa sen jalkeen kun heidan laheinen ystavansa kuolee ja jattaa heille junaliput seka viimeisen toivomuksen: heidan pitaa ottaa naisen tytar mukaan. Talla kertaa matkustelu ympari Eurooppaa osoittautuu vaikeaksi heille, kun kadonneet passit, junalakot ja odottamattomat romanttiset suhteet sekoittavat heidan ystavyyssuhteensa. Kysymys kuuluukin: ehtivatko he ajoissa kunnioittamaan ystavansa muistoa?

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Neighbor for sale
programme.desc: Koskettavassa komediassa repsahtanut alkoholisti Nick Halsey (Will Ferrell) on pihalla. Nimittain kun vaimo jattaa ja toista tulee potkut, on surkean miehen ainoa vaihtoehto asettua taloksi etupihalleen uloskannettujen tavaroidensa kanssa. Nickille tarjoutuu kuitenkin pateva porsaanreika paheksutulle ja luvattomalle asuinmuodolleen, kun han saa laillista jatkoaikaa ulkoiluunsa pitamalla pihakirppiksen.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: Hellyttava komedia omalaatuisesta keski-ikaisesta kirjailijasta Richard Dunnista (JEFF DANIELS), jonka tyhjan paperin syndrooma on sysannyt syrjaseudulle metsastamaan inspiraatiota. Vaimonsa ja kuvitteellisen supersankarin paheksunnasta huolimatta Richard ystavystyy paikallisen samanmielisen teinityton kanssa. Toisiltaan he saavat vastaukset kysymyksiin, joita he eivat ole osanneet esittaa.

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: Jeff Chang on yliopiston priimus ja koko perheen suuri toivo. Hanen parhaat kaverinsapolkaisevat yllattaen pystyyn 21-vuotissynttarit, joten Jeffin pitaa tehda valinta.Meneeko han pirteana laaketieteellisen paasykokeeseen? Heittaytyyko han villiinyohon, joka sisaltaa drinkkeja, sylitanssia, harkaratsastusta, bodyshotteja, golfkarrykisan, katolta hyppimista, oksentamista, pukeutumista naiseksi, tappelua, biletyttoja ja ajamista kannissa? Kumman itse valitsisit?

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: The Beach Bum
programme.desc: The Beach Bum seuraa loppuun palaneen Moondogin (Matthew McConaughey) hillittomia epaonnenkolauksia hanen toimiessaan vain omien pelisaantojensa mukaan. Huikea tahtikaarti -Snoop Dogg, Isla Fisher, Zac Efron, Jimmy Buffett, Martin Lawrence ja Jonah Hill - takaa villin menon kumouksellissa uutuuskomediassa, jonka tarjoilee kasikirjoittaja-ohjaaja Harmony Korine.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years Of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe Khatchadorianilla on vaikeasti lausuttava sukunimi, valtavan vilkas mielikuvitus... ja ongelmia auktoriteettien kanssa. Rafe ei ole mikaan vallankumouksellinen anarkisti, mutta han on kuitenkin aloittamassa koulunkayntia jo jarjestyksessa kolmannella ylaasteellaan. Rafen toita paiskiva yksinhuoltajaaiti toivoo, etta tama koulu lopultakin sopisi hanen pojalleen. Mutta Hills Villagen ylaasteella yksilonvapautta ei kunnioiteta, vaan voimassa ovat epaoikeudenmukaiset kayttaytymissaannot. Rehtori-Dwight ei jata huomioimatta yhtakaan rikkomusta, koska han haluaa pysya ykkosena alueen koulujen suoritustilastoissa.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Hamekytta - Pojasta Polvi Paranee
programme.desc: Todistettuaan murhan FBI-agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) ja hanen poikapuolensa (Brandon T. Jackson) joutuvat vetamaan valeasut niskaansa ja ryhtymaan tutkimuksiin – ainoastaan tytoille tarkoitetussa taidekoulussa. Entistakin enemman hauskuutta!

programme.title: Meet Bill
programme.desc: Bill on oikea tohvelisankari! Han tyoskentelee kellon ympari appiukkonsa pankissa ja vaimo kayttaa hanta torkeasti hyvakseen eika halua selitella "ystavyyttaan" lipevan televisiojulkkiksen Chipin kanssa. Sitten Bill tapaa Lucyn, sievan alusvaatekaupan myyjan, ja elama alkaa vihdoin maistua paremmalta. Bill ja Lucy ryhtyvat yhdessa kohentamaan Billin heikkoa itseluottamusta!

programme.title: Joe - jokapaikan hoyla
programme.desc: Tim Allenin esittama Joe on mies, jonka elama on muuttunut vakaasti aina vain surkeammaksi. Kun toimiston kiusaaja menee liian pitkalle, Joe paattaa vihdoin muuttua mitattomyydesta joksikin paremmaksi.

programme.title: Mama Weed
programme.desc: Kun alipalkattu poliisin tulkki huomaa takavarikon yhteydessa, etta yksi osallisista on hanen lahipiiriaan, han tekee kohtalokkaan paatoksen. Han onnistuu takavarikoimaan jattimaisen hasiseran, jonka seka poliisi etta alamaailma haluavat, ja kenttakokemuksellaan ja poliisin resursseilla han aloittaa oman rikollisen toimintansa ja vaihtaa huumediilerin uraan.

programme.title: Hamekytta 2
programme.desc: Hamekytan villissa jatko-osassa Martin Lawrence ja Nia Long palaavatviihdyttamaan koko perhetta. Kansakunnan turvallisuus on uhattuna ja FBI-agenttiMalcolm Turner in on jalleen kerran...

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Three Day Millionaire
programme.desc: Pohjois-Englannin Grimsbyhyn sijoittuva riehakas komedia sateen piiskaamien satamien nuorista kalastajista, jotka joutuvat tekemaan elamansa ryoston pelastaakseen kotikaupunkinsa. Unohtakaa Ocean’s Eleven, silla tassa tulee Grimsby’s Four.

programme.title: MacGruber
programme.desc: Maailmanrauha on vaarassa, terroristit vaanivat, maailma tarvitsee supersankarin, jolla on tukka kuin Hillary Clintonilla. Kenelle pitaa soittaa? MacGruberille! Han on sotakone ilman asetta, mutta kehittaa mita vaan pelkasta klemmarista. Han on niin salainenagentti, etta kukaan ei edes tieda miehen etunimea! Naiset haluavat olla kuin han ja miehet haluavat olla hanen kanssaan... vai miten se meni?

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this Republic Pictures western about the final days of the Pony Express. Former rider John Blair (Wayne) enters a coach race to win a $25,000 government mail contract, but there are dozens of obstacles in his path. The rest of the cast includes Lane Chandler and Phyllis Fraser, plus Lew Kelly (Lady of Burlesque) doing a great comic turn as Rocky OBrien, the eccentric, self-proclaimed mayor of a deserted mining town.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Dad Longworth robs a Mexican bank, takes the loot, and leaves his partner Rio to be captured. However, Rio escapes capture and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Land of Hunted Men
programme.desc: A band of outlaws is terrorizing a town in the West. Leave it to Ray Crash Corrigan and his Range Busters to ride in and save the day. This film marked the return of Corrigan to the famous series; he had appeared in the first sixteen movies but left for a brief hiatus following 1942s ARIZONA STAGECOACH. This was the 21st of 24 movies in the Range Busters series. Produced between 1940-1943, the Range Busters were a huge financial success for Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. Its all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A cavalry officer sympathetic to the wronged Sioux tribe fixes a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant but a dishonest Indian Agent and a hateful General Custer test the Siouxs patience, threatening to derail the peace-talks. Directed and co-written by Sidney Salkow; starring Dale Robertson, Mary Murphy, J. Carrol Naish. Also, look for legendary character actor Iron Eyes Cody as Crazy Horse.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: Its the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In an episode called Koniakers, G-Men Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett investigate how U.S. currency in a bank vault was replaced by counterfeit money. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West. In this episode, Pat and Stoney get reports that a man is selling salted mines to investors. The two G-men are determined to discover the truth. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joes hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) threatens to close down the Cannonball on Christmas Eve, disrupting the Shady Rest hotels holiday plans. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Directed by Guy Scarpita. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after hes arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A railroad detective pursues the infamous female outlaw, Belle Starr, after a herd of horses are stolen from the U.S. Calvalry. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Belle Starr is played by Mary Windsor. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as railroad detective Matt Clark who needs to track down a group of cattle rustlers along with their notorious leader Billy the Kid (played by Richard Jaeckel).This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a couple of con men attempt to snare Letty into their scheme and spirit her away to San Francisco. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, a Texas Ranger is shot down in cold blood. Determined to bring the killer to justice, the Judge and Jeff turn their focus on Curly, but with a lack of evidence the lawmen are patient until they break the case. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Looking through an old trunk, Tagg and his friend Johnny Ward, the son of a murdered lawman, find proof that his uncle is an ex-convict and may be involved in a recent bank robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. The sheriff being the editors best man, the grief-stricken editor begins to escalate the anger towards a suspected drifter with his bias reporting. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye teams up with Benjamin Franklin to take down a tyrant.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Townspeople discriminate against a young Indian doctor. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The son of a neighboring rancher intends to sell their land for a mining operation that will ruin the water rights agreement that Andy and Ben made years ago. Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Grand Canyon Trail
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures feature about the hunt for silver in a deserted ghost town. Songs include Colorado Joe and Everythings Going My Way. Plus, look for Andy Devine as Cookie Bullfincher. Film buffs should look for silent screen foil James Finlayson, a familiar face from various Keystone Cop comedies, as the local sheriff.

programme.title: Im From Arkansas
programme.desc: Welcome to Pitchfork, Arkansas, where proud farmer Juniper Jenkins is celebrating his prize hog Esmeralda giving birth to 18 piglets. The event attracts many tourists and real life country musicians to Pitchfork, including Mary Ford, Merle Travis, Jimmy Wakely, and countless others. How the smalltown folks react to all of the hubbub is a formula for comedy. Starring as Farmer Jenkins is Slim Summerville, a former Keystone Cop who became one of Hollywoods most reliable journeyman, appearing in everything from Charlie Chan and Shirley Temple movies, to the classic All Quiet on the Western Front. Also starring Bruce Bennett Maude Eburne, Cliff Nazarro, Al St. John, Arthur Q. Bryan, and...

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: A widow with a young daughter travels to a ranch in Wyoming to manage the household of a rancher. After a while the man and woman develop a relationship that leads to a marriage. But life in the harsh place takes its toll.

programme.title: Mohawk
programme.desc: Kurt Neumann (The Fly, Rocketship X-M) directed this bawdy tale of a love that was louder than war drums! With a cast that includes Scott Brady, Rita Gam, and Neville Brand, the story takes place on a remote army post where an artist romances a trio of women, just as a vengeful settler turns the army and the local Iroquois tribe against each other. Film buffs might like to know that the cinematography for this feature is by four-time Oscar nominee Karl Struss, who won an Academy Award in 1929 for his work on Sunrise.

programme.title: Man from Utah
programme.desc: WHIRLING ROPES AND SNARLING GUNS IN THE GALLOPING GRIP OF A GLAMOROUS DRAMA! John Wayne stars as John Weston, a man hired to investigate shady doings at a local rodeo. It seems all the riders who are on the verge of winning end up dead. Along with Wayne, this tale of action on the range also stars the usual Lone Star Picture stock company, including Gabby Hayes and Yakima Canutt!

programme.title: Fighting Caravans
programme.desc: Clint Belmet (Gary Cooper) is a frontier scout with his hands full in this 1931 Paramount Pictures version of Zane Greys novel. Hes helping guide a wagon train across the country, fighting off various attacks on the way, and falling for his lovely Felice (Lily Damita). Belmets grizzled companions think he should leave the woman alone, but it gets lonely out on the trail, and Felices charms are hard to resist. Featuring such notable character actors of the period as Ernest Torrence, Tully Marshall, and Fred Kolher, this vintage Hollywood Western still packs a wallop!

programme.title: Raiders of Old California
programme.desc: The end of the Mexican-American War finds a brazen U.S. Calvary captain and his men taking over a Spanish land grant. Albert C. Gannaway (The Badge of Marshall Brennan) directs an all-star cast including Jim Davis (Jock Ewing of Dallas), Arleen Whelan (Young Mr. Lincoln) and Lee Van Cleef (The Good, The Bad, and the Ugly). Also, look for appearances by legendary country and western stars Marty Robbins and Faron Young.

programme.title: Last of the Clintons
programme.desc: Icon of early talking pictures, Harry Carey (Red River), portrays the rugged Trigger Carson, a noble cowboy who infiltrates an outlaw gang in order to expose their rackets. Ordered to kidnap a young girl, his identity is revealed and he is forced to fight his way out of the gang and back to safety. Already 56 by the time he signed on to do this and a series of Westerns for Berke Productions, the stately Carrey (who netted an Oscar nomination four years later) was widely lauded at the time for adding a great deal of maturity and respectability due to his undeniable presence and strong performances.

programme.title: Feud of the Trail
programme.desc: Feud of the Trail places the dashing Tom Tylerr, a B-Western star (and the original Captain Marvel) in dual roles; as a man seeking justice against a band of outlaws, and the bands vicious gang leader. Capably directed by helmer Robert F. Hill (Flash Gordon, Tarzan the Fearless), and shot at the iconic Lazy A Ranch outside of Los Angeles, the film follows Tom Wade, an honorable man with a face thats nearly identical to nefarious gang leader Jack Granger. Using this to his advantage, Wade exploits his similar looks to impersonate the gangster and infiltrate his band of ruffians.

programme.title: The Range Busters
programme.desc: In the first of the Range Buster series, a mysterious figure is killing the help at the Circle T Ranch. The Range Busters are called in to help, but cant figure out the murderers identity. Is it Torrence, a longtime rival of the Circle T, or is it blind uncle Rolph? Ray Crash Corrigan, John Dusty King, and Alibi Max Terhune head the cast. Director S. Roy Luby (Border Phantom, Black Market Rustlers), also has a fine list of supporting players, including Luana Walters, Leroy Mason, and Kermit Maynard.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, sent by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In Mysterious Decoy, Pat and Stony get involved with the famous half-way house that settled the Utah-Arizona boundary. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the boys rout out Ole Gimpys ghost.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but hes not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is shot dead after discovering oil on his property. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951 .It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: An ex-con is released from prison seeking vengeance against those who put him there. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark tracks down the James Brothers who seek revenge on the law following the death of their half-brother.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Also, look for legendary tough guy actor lee Van Cleef as Jesse James.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Railroad detective Matt Clark is challenged by a band of freight-car robbers led by Apache chief Geronimo. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, plus Chief Yowlachie and Emile Meyer. Directed by William Witney.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Luck O The Irish
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, Judge Roy and Taggart are intrigued by the arrival of Pat OHara and his much younger wife Kate. Pats fondess for drink and gambling has him involved with the towns rowdies who are eying his beautiful bride. The Judge helps sort things out.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Deputy Jeff Taggart is cheated in a horse deal. When the trader is found murdered, Jeff is the chief suspect. Judge Bean has to discover the actual murderer to save his friend from the gallows. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie is on the case when homesteaders are forced to sell their land for cheap due to suspicious circumstances. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook set out to prove the innocence of the Delaware tribe. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: After leaving his father for dead when they are attacked by Hurons, Tom Morgan flees his village. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights take a young boy to the Ponderosa after the death of his mother. Hoss is the only one that is able to get through the boys hostility and bitterness, but, as the two begin to get close, the boys father breaks out of prison and comes to retrieve the boy.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: In Old Cheyenne
programme.desc: Roy Rogers plays a newspaper reporter sent to Cheyenne to investigate a reputed troublemaker. While on the scene, he discovers who the real bad guys are, and sets out to right some wrongs. Also starring Roys usual sidekick George Gabby Hayes, plus Joan Woodbury, and George Rosener. This Republic Pictures western was helmed by director Joseph Kane (The Undersea Kingdom, Dakota) and features two musical numbers: Bonita and Linda Flor.

programme.title: Man from Music Mountain
programme.desc: Gene Autry stops singing long enough to take on some nasty land developers in this oldtime western from Republic Pictures. Of course, it wouldnt be a Gene Autry movie if there werent at least a few songs, and this one comes packed with such numbers as Im Beginning to Care, Love, Burning Love, and the title song. Genes longtime sidekick Smiley Burnette gets to sing a few, too, including She Works Third Tub at the Laundry.

programme.title: Public Cowboy No. 1
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Smiley Burnette are back, and this time theyre dealing with some very modern thinking rustlers. These new criminals have taken up the latest technologies to outsmart the authorities, including shortwave radios and airplanes! Can Gene and Smiley get em? You bet! Songs include The West Aint What It Used To Be, I Got the HeebieJeebie Blues, and The Defective Detective from Brooklyn. Gene also gets romantic when he sings, I Picked up the Trail when I Found You...

programme.title: Yellowneck
programme.desc: Location shooting in the Florida Everglades add to this dramatic tale of five Confederate deserters trying to get to Cuba. First, they must overcome snake bites, unfriendly Seminoles, and their own conflicts with each other. How many of the five will actually make it out alive? Lin McCarthy, Stephen Courtleigh, and Berry Kroeger star in this little known example of 1950s independent filmmaking.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: In 1775, Daniel Boone (George OBrien) leads thirty colonial families to Kentucky where they face the threats of Native American marauders led by rebel Simon Girty (John Carradine). Thats just the beginning, for there are even more dangers and clashes ahead for Boone and his party. With a cast that includes Ralph Forbes, Heather Angel, and lovable child star Dickie Jones, director David Howard takes us through one of the most exciting periods in American history!

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: In Old Colorado
programme.desc: Hopalong Cassidy and his crew get involved in a war over water rights in this feature from Harry Sherman Productions and Paramount Pictures. The intrigue starts when crafty Joe Weller (Morris Ankrum) turns two ranchers against each other, which leads to dire results. This is the 33rd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy movies, with WIlliam Boyd in the role he made famous. Also, look for regular Hoppy co-stars Russell Hayden as Lucky Jenkins, and Andy Clyde as California Carson.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The Butch Cavendish gang ambushes a group of Texas Rangers, killing all but one. The surviving ranger is nursed back to health by Native American Tonto, and takes on the identity of a masked vigilante, determined to bring all outlaws to justice. Culled from episodes of the popular TV series, this feature is great fun for fans of the Lone Ranger. Starring Clayton Moore and Jay Silverheels.

programme.title: Hope for Marine Life Part 2
programme.desc: Get to know a baby seal and see the challenge it poses for Hope’s rehab team.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.desc: Check out a pile of puzzling lumps and bumps on a finch, a frog, and many more.

programme.desc: Seek out a friendly buddy, like a cockapoo or a shichon, for a shy little boy.

programme.title: Dream Come True
programme.desc: Check out Yorkies and other cuties who make a girl’s long-held dream come true.

programme.title: Offroad and Fun
programme.desc: Belgian Rally Championship and more.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Its time once again for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers are already out there doing test laps, take a behind-the-scenes look at what really goes on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is regared as a dress rehearsal for the 24 hour race.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: A look at the 24 hour race, the Strong Man Run and the Tourist drivers.

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s; many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Hosts Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite petrol heads from the Middle East to bring their tuned cars to the The Walk at Jumeirah Beach and have it rated in the categories speed, style and sound.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Customized luxury vehicles visit The Walk, the glamorous Jumeirah Beach boulevard; car owners get their vehicles judged by Saif Hattawi.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Tuned and customized vehicles are scored based on speed, style and sound; among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: France has a long tradition in the automobile industry and the current models of domestic manufacturers do not have to hide from their international competition. The best example is the Peugeot 508, the brands new flagship.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: After the diesel affair, Volkswagen must regain the trust of its customers. The manufacturer launches many new models on the market. Before the official world premieres, Volkswagen gives journalists the opportunity to gain their first impressions.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang: US legend, aggressive looks and wonderful V8 sound? Not quite, because in this episode two bestsellers with cheat packs under the hood compete against each other: BMW 430i against Ford Mustang 2.3 EcoBoost.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Stinger is Kias most visually dynamic model yet and it also comes with a 147 kW diesel engine. But can the South Korean sports coupe convince in the test? Subaru is more consistent than Porsche as they work exclusively with Boxer.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: In the United States and Europe alike, people like to show off their fast and exciting sports cars; presenting five convertibles for hot summer days.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: One of the most exclusive cars in the world is the Pagani Huayra; its counterpart is the Rimac Concept One, the worlds fastest electric car with a top speed of 355 km/h; the Lamborghini Huracan O.CT and Arden Jaguar F-Type promise raw power.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: MotorStories

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Miritz loves vintage cars and has one dream: A trip through the USA with his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5. But before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Tillmann starts his dream journey in New York, the city that never sleeps; with his Mercedes 280 SE convertible he visits the legendary classic car dealer Eliot Cuker who made his fortune with his passion for old cars.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Portrait of Ferruccio Lamborghini, who originally built tractors, but then moved on to found one of the most famous sports car factories in the world.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Ferdinand Anton Ernst Porsche was a pioneer of the car business and created an icon among automobiles, the Porsche 356.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: One of the most successful rally drivers of all time, Walter Roehrl.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: Offroad and Fun
programme.desc: Belgian Rally Championship and more.

programme.title: Racetrack, Part 17
programme.desc: Featuring the British GT Championship and the European Truck Racing Championship.

programme.title: Racetrack, Part 17
programme.desc: Featuring the British GT Championship and the European Truck Racing Championship.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A ride in the Mercedes AMG SLS GT on the airfield and in a Porsche 911 Turbo S on the racetrack; Audi R8s innovative light engineering.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Jaguar is back in the world of sports cars with the F-Type, looking good and showing against the BMW Z4.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Corvette, the Ford Mustang GT and the Chevrolet Camaro are the embodiment of the American sportscar.

programme.title: Lamborghini Huracan by O.CT
programme.desc: A lot of power thanks to a compressor; this optimized O.CT Lamborghini Huracán delivers over 800 horse power to get the blood flowing.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: BMW, one of the most successful automobile groups in the world, promises the joy of driving.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Porsche 550 Spyder is small, flat and fast. It wrote history, even though only 140 of them were produced.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The motor sport history of Ford.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: BMW is one of the most successful automotive companies in the world. From the beginning, racing is one of the pillars for this success.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The golden years of racing for Porsche.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition; in early September, the region hosts thousands of bikers attending European Bike Week.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Biker Lifestyle

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker in Carinthia is a popular holiday paradise in southern Austria and a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the travel destination for thousands of bikers.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker in Carinthia hosts the annual European Bike Week.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region hosts thousands of bikers attending European Bike Week.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: American SUVs are large, have powerful engines and offer plenty of space.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Everything that has wheels can be tuned, SUVs are no exception either. The big vehicles are already impressive from the get go, but there is always more: powerful wheels, crazy colors and performance data similar to those of super sports cars.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Usually you wouldnt see small cars like the Audi A1, Volkswagen Golf, and Mini on an all-wheel magazine. But when the A becomes an S and the Golf gets an R, the small cars turn into strong all-wheel beasts. Thats reason enough to test them.

programme.title: Tourist Trophy
programme.desc: Riders race through this legendary 37-mile course reaching speeds of over 200 miles per hour in a stunning display of skill and bravery in what has been deemed the most dangerous race in the world.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The three super cars from this episode promise more power and more elegance. Thanks to tuning company Kelleners Sport, the new BMW 640i Gran Coupe offers even more bite. Thanks to its beautiful equipment and additional legroom, the Maserati Quattroporte GTS encourages to travelling. Thanks to all-wheel drive, the Porsche 911 Carrera 4S offers more fun and more safety on critical terrain.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Test days at the legendary race track in France before the 90th Le Mans Race.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: At the 2013 Frankfurt Motor Show Porsche introduced the new 911 range. It includes the new Porsche 911 Turbo, which is the most powerful Porsche model yet. For 50 years Porsche has been making car drivers around the world very happy with its sports cars. In celebration of the anniversary Supercars takes a closer look at the past, present and future models of the Porsche 911.

programme.title: Racetrack, Part 17
programme.desc: Featuring the British GT Championship and the European Truck Racing Championship.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: The lowdown on the latest from the local and international motoring circuit, from banter-filled studio discussions to in-depth reviews.

programme.title: Buyers Guide
programme.desc: We go in search of the ideal bakkie for a growing food business; we find the perfect German sedan within a R1.2 million budget and we examine an Opel Corsa with ongoing turbo problems.

programme.title: Garage Gold
programme.desc: Most valuable collection of carefully kept cars in the back of garages.

programme.title: Petrol Heads
programme.desc: Competitors at the Drift Expo have their hands full as the heavens open up over the Wild Coast Sun. We get up close and personal with a VW Golf 2 with a sting in the tail. A local drag racing star shares some his quarter mile highlights.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Paul has to slide underneath an exploding vehicle, while Anna is catapulted in the air.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: One stuntman has to go head over heels in his car, while two colleagues combine a car chase with a fistfight.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Stuntmen operate an Artega GT at full speed with a remote control.

programme.title: Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur
programme.desc: Flowing lines and an elegance that is unmatched; the 1959 Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur aims to build bridges in the companys model range; from the sporty origin of the brand to the luxury of its new owner, Rolls Royce.

programme.title: Episode 9
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: At the Gamma Christmas Mixer, Sarah is missing and her friends search leads to a shocking attack.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Most leave for break, while a few stay behind. Rick is pushed to his breaking point and flips out on Allison.

programme.title: Maria My Love
programme.desc: A young woman named Ana is struggling to deal with her mothers death and her fathers mistakes. In an effort to feel better, she reconnects with her half-sister Grace, (Lauren Fales) and, inspired by a new boyfriend (Brian Rieger), sets out on a quest to find someone to help. Though excited and hopeful when she meets an eccentric woman named Maria (Karen Black), she soon discovers Maria is a compulsive hoarder, and is swept up in a situation more emotionally and morally complicated than she had expected to find. Inspired by a true story.

programme.title: Killer Caregiver
programme.desc: After a woman is wounded in an accident, a young and attractive live-in caregiver moves into her home where strange and dangerous events unfold until the woman discovers her caregiver is hell-bent on destroying her life.

programme.title: Love You to Death
programme.desc: A prosecutor must work on a case which reminds her of her childhood, when her mother was killed by her alcoholic father.

programme.title: Sisters Obsession, A
programme.desc: After Kendras happy life starts to unravel, she soon discovers the cause is a vengeful long-lost twin sister.

programme.title: Lethal Beauty
programme.desc: A masseuse pays the price for being a good Samaritan when the young woman she helps turns out to be a killer.

programme.title: The Wrong Husband
programme.desc: Melanie discovers her husband is actually his twin, Alex, back to steal his life—and willing to kill for it.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: A lawyer is riding high after putting a receiving a Not Guilty verdict for her client, but has to look over her shoulder when a woman she meets in a traffic accident is not all she appears to be.

programme.title: Mediator
programme.desc: A family counselor in the missing childrens division becomes a mediator between the living and the missing.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: Karen, the beautiful single mother of precious 9-year-old Justin, never really had much luck with love. This all seems to change when she falls for her “Prince Charming”, Dennis, who is both a caring gentleman and a great friend to her son. But her perfect world begins to crumble when she finds a black rose on her doorstep, hears noises in the attic and gets prank calls in the middle of the night. After breaking up with Dennis her life begins to turn upside down and strange things start happening. Questioning her own sanity and left alone by authorities, friends and family, she decides to take matters into her own hands- a dangerous decision that puts her life on the line…

programme.title: Sweetheart Con
programme.desc: Heartbroken over her parents breakup and recovering from a car accident, Jane becomes increasingly suspicious of her mothers charming new boyfriend.

programme.title: Satisfy Me
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Satisfy Me follows the life of a lady in her late thirties who wants to settle down by any means, which leads her into marrying a man with narcissistic personality disorder. She loses herself trying to boost his ego, not realising he is mentally unstable until it becomes too late.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Rival twin sisters compete against each other for recognition because one of them has always feel left out and segregated by friends and their family and now she must fight to prove a point that she is important.

programme.title: Burden
programme.desc: Stella suffers a devastating loss when her husband leaves her suddenly. She slowly finds happiness when she falls for the doctor that treats her, but things get complicated when her husband comes back to fight for their marriage.

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 457
programme.desc: AMC presents music from the latest African artists.

programme.title: Hurdles
programme.desc: An arrogant, fastidious and yet successful young lady eventually meets her match. To her dismay, he is unnerved by her attitude, flouts her rules and refuses to bend to her will, causing him to get under her skin.

programme.title: Recall
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Dave develops amnesia after getting into a car accident with his wife, Cindy. He does not remember his wife at all and only recalls his time with his ex-girlfriend, Stella. As Cindy battles to get Dave to recognise her again, Stella manipulates Dave and worms her way back into his life.

programme.title: Indecent Affair
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a womans controlling husband convinces her to pose as his cousin at a work event so his philandering boss can seduce her, the consequences are not only dire, but they also impose on everyone a journey of self discovery.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - Dead Tide
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: Obsession
programme.desc: Jealousy rears its ugly head and puts a couples relationship in jeopardy when they invite guests to stay over in their home.

programme.title: Samantha
programme.desc: An extranged couple decide to get together, along with their new partners, to discuss custody and well-being of the estranged couples daughter, samantha. Things start to go awry as old wounds are reopened and old feelings, good and bad start to resurface.

programme.title: Get Over It
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Muna tries to help her friend, Hauwa, who has just been dumped by her boyfriend. Muna begins a YouTube series to help her friend get out of that post relationship depression by encouraging her to despise men, but she falls in love with their very annoying neighbour instead. Tired of hiding her new relationship, she is stuck with the options of either risking her friendship and career or risking a chance at love.

programme.title: Blood and Rope
programme.desc: When 21-year-old Nnadubem becomes fascinated by the dambe traditional Hausa sport of bare- knuckle rope boxing. He has to convert a community of doubters and earn the respect of fellow fighters to be accepted as a warrior.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Salle
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Tales of Vanessa
programme.desc: Vanessa constantly manipulates her boyfriend, Deji, who has been thoroughly spoiled by his mother, into giving her money. But soon the money Deji is getting from his mother is not enough for her, so she schemes to get it directly from the sources.

programme.title: Flee
programme.desc: A man sees his faith challenged when his integrity compromised by a young woman who is relentlessly after him for marriage.

programme.title: No Late Nights
programme.desc: A newly-wed couple, James and Bella face challenges when Bella’s paranoia about night-time threatens their relationship.

programme.title: Daybreak
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A typical heartbreaker and playboy wakes up to find out that his manhood has disappeared. He consults a prophet and finds out the curse has been put on him by one of the women he has angered and he has 24 hours to seek forgiveness from the one who has cursed him. The problem is, he doesnt know who the culprit is amongst all the women he has angered.

programme.title: Indecent Affair
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a womans controlling husband convinces her to pose as his cousin at a work event so his philandering boss can seduce her, the consequences are not only dire, but they also impose on everyone a journey of self discovery.

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 457
programme.desc: AMC presents music from the latest African artists.

programme.title: Destined
programme.desc: Roberts takes June and her mother into his household when he meets them in dire need. Their relationhsip becomes complicated when Junes mother dies, leaving Roberts feeling responsible for her.

programme.title: Violet
programme.desc: Temi is on the verge of tying the knot with his long time girlfriend Renny, but inexplicably changes his mind when he meets a blind lady named Violet.

programme.title: Uche Who Works In Lekki
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Uche Who Works In Lekki is a black comedy about an ad agency exec who makes a grave mistake by overpromising a payment to a hard-to-get Afrobeat star without the knowledge of his agency and must do everything possible to rectify it before his boss finds out.

programme.title: Maid In A Mansion
programme.desc: A woman is accused of her husband’s death due to their tumultuous relationship, but all is not as it seems within the household.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Erica Nlewedim
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Entanglement
programme.desc: After years of being broke and looking for a job, a man has a chance encounter that lands him a well-paying job, but this threatens to jeopardise his relationship with his girlfriend who has been by his side through thick and thin.

programme.title: Shaffys Sister
programme.desc: Shaffy’s sister, Daisy struggles to interact with her family and find her place in the society after spending years in prison.

programme.title: Satisfy Me
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Satisfy Me follows the life of a lady in her late thirties who wants to settle down by any means, which leads her into marrying a man with narcissistic personality disorder. She loses herself trying to boost his ego, not realising he is mentally unstable until it becomes too late.

programme.title: Fashion Insider - Funto Adeyemo
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Shades Of Lies
programme.desc: Tenis ambitions get the best of her when she follows bad advices at work after her boss, chief maxwell, is involved in an accident. When chief maxwells family suspect foul play, the police get involved and it becomes increasingly clear that there is more to chief maxwells death than meets the eye.

programme.title: Double Crossed
programme.desc: When Eric refuses to seek medical remedy for his sexual problems, Adanna discreetly satisfies her starved urge from a close family associate.

programme.title: Green
programme.desc: After years of being alone, believing they have missed out on love, two people, who are old in years but young at heart, find each other.

programme.title: Recall
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Dave develops amnesia after getting into a car accident with his wife, Cindy. He does not remember his wife at all and only recalls his time with his ex-girlfriend, Stella. As Cindy battles to get Dave to recognise her again, Stella manipulates Dave and worms her way back into his life.

programme.title: Indecent Affair
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a womans controlling husband convinces her to pose as his cousin at a work event so his philandering boss can seduce her, the consequences are not only dire, but they also impose on everyone a journey of self discovery.

programme.desc: The ever-smooth Simes dusts off his flares, fires up the lava lamp and takes you on a psychedelic spin through the 70s. Side effects may include sudden urges to perm your hair!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day- Its A MASSIVE 70s Party!

programme.desc: Brilliant songs, big voices, blazing hair and bags of attitude - the ladies of the 80s had the lot! From Toyah to Tina and Joan Jett to Janet Jackson.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodiers No.2s of 1981

programme.desc: Kettumaisen ovela Velho varastaa keijujen kullan, jolloin syttyy lahes maailmansota vihaisten keijujen ja holmistyneiden smurffien valille.

programme.title: Pingu
programme.sub-title: Pingu the King | Pingu the Baker
programme.desc: Pingu sees a picture in a book of a tower that goes to the sky and wants to build one just like it. | Pinga discovers a book about kingdoms and Pingu thinks that it would be great to be a king. | Pingu wants to bake his own cake.

programme.title: Smurffit
programme.desc: Smurffit yrittavat pelastaa metsastajien kynsista kauriin, joka ei ole lainkaan sita, milta nayttaa.

programme.title: Smurffit
programme.desc: Tama on dramaattinen ja liikuttava tarina Smurffiinan ja hanen lemmikkihiirensa ystavyydesta. Surullinen tapahtuma saa Smurffiinan puhkeamaan kyyneliin. | Dreamy haluaa kohdata ulkoavaruuden olentoja niin paljon, ettei kukaan usko hanta, kun han kertoo tavanneensa sellaisen.

programme.title: Pingu
programme.sub-title: Pingu and the Hose | Pottery Pingu
programme.desc: Pingu discovers that the further he rolls his snowballs, the bigger they become. | Pingu uses a hose and funnel to play tricks on his family and friends. | Pingu wants to have a go on Grandfather’s potter’s wheel but his pottery is nowhere near as good as Grandfather’s.

programme.title: Smurffit
programme.desc: Kevaalla kaikki Smurffit kilvoittelevat Smurffiinan suosiosta, ja Velho lukee loitsun hanen paalleen kaapatakseen Smurffit. Suursmurffi tulee apuun ja tekee Velhon aikeet tyhjaksi holmon Rontin avulla.

programme.title: Smurffit

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Mitzi kutsuu Bloomin ja taman ystavat halloween-juhliin kummitustaloon.

programme.title: Winx Club

programme.title: Smurffit
programme.desc: Älysmurffi haastaa Tuffyn maalaamaan Iso Suu varpaankynnet Laiskan pyjamabileissa. | Smurffit jarjestavat autokilpailun maarittaakseen parhaan automallin ylityollistetylle Askartelijalle.
